5029Yetani::SizePixel Yetani::outputConvertToPixel(const Yetani::OutputId output_id
5030 , const Yetani::SizePercent& size
5031 ) const noexcept
5032{
5033 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
5034
5035 if(output_data.outputid_to_wloutput.contains(output_id) == false)
5036 {
5037 return { 0, 0 };
5038 }
5039
5040 struct wl_output* wl_output = output_data.outputid_to_wloutput.at(output_id);
5041 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map.at(wl_output);
5042
5043 auto p = convertPercentToPixel(output, size.width, size.height);
5044
5045 return { p.first, p.second };
5046}
5047
5048
5058void Yetani::outputOnAdd(LambdaOutputId lambda
5059 ) noexcept
5060{
5061 if(lambda == nullptr)
5062 {
5063 on_output_add = LambdaOutputId_DoNothing;
5064 }
5065 else
5066 {
5067 on_output_add = lambda;
5068 }
5069}
5070
5071
5081void Yetani::outputOnChange(LambdaOutputId lambda
5082 ) noexcept
5083{
5084 if(lambda == nullptr)
5085 {
5086 on_output_change = LambdaOutputId_DoNothing;
5087 }
5088 else
5089 {
5090 on_output_change = lambda;
5091 }
5092}
5093
5094
5104void Yetani::outputOnRemove(LambdaOutputId lambda
5105 ) noexcept
5106{
5107 if(lambda == nullptr)
5108 {
5109 on_output_remove = LambdaOutputId_DoNothing;
5110 }
5111 else
5112 {
5113 on_output_remove = lambda;
5114 }
5115}
5116
5117
5126void Yetani::convertPixel(struct wl_surface* wl_surface
5127 , const int32_t pixel_xw
5128 , const int32_t pixel_yh
5129 , float& mm_xw
5130 , float& mm_yh
5131 , float& pc_xw
5132 , float& pc_yh
5133 ) const noexcept
5134{
5135 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
5136
5137 const Yetani::VectorWlOutput& vector = output_data.surface_output_map.at(wl_surface);
5138 struct wl_output* wl_output = vector.front();
5139 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map.at(wl_output);
5140
5141 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output, pixel_xw, pixel_yh);
5142 mm_xw = mm.first;
5143 mm_yh = mm.second;
5144
5145 auto pc = convertPixelToPercent(output, pixel_xw, pixel_yh);
5146 pc_xw = pc.first;
5147 pc_yh = pc.second;
5148}
5149
5150
5162std::pair<float, float> Yetani::convertPixelToMm(const Yetani::Output& output
5163 , int32_t xw
5164 , int32_t yh
5165 ) const noexcept
5166{
5167 const float ratio_h = output.pixels_per_mm_horizontal;
5168 const float ratio_v = output.pixels_per_mm_vertical;
5169
5170 return
5171 { xw / ratio_h
5172 , yh / ratio_v
5173 };
5174}
5175
5176
5188std::pair<float, float> Yetani::convertPixelToPercent(const Yetani::Output& output
5189 , int32_t xw
5190 , int32_t yh
5191 ) const noexcept
5192{
5193 return
5194 { float(xw) / output.width
5195 , float(yh) / output.height
5196 };
5197}
5198
5199
5211std::pair<int32_t, int32_t> Yetani::convertMmToPixel(const Yetani::Output& output
5212 , float xw
5213 , float yh
5214 ) const noexcept
5215{
5216 const float ratio_h = output.pixels_per_mm_horizontal;
5217 const float ratio_v = output.pixels_per_mm_vertical;
5218
5219 return
5220 { int32_t(xw * ratio_h)
5221 , int32_t(yh * ratio_v)
5222 };
5223}
5224
5225
5237std::pair<int32_t, int32_t> Yetani::convertPercentToPixel(const Yetani::Output& output
5238 , float xw
5239 , float yh
5240 ) const noexcept
5241{
5242 return
5243 { int32_t(xw * output.width)
5244 , int32_t(yh * output.height)
5245 };
5246}
5247
5248
5260void Yetani::outputNotifySurface(Yetani* yetani
5261 , struct wl_output* wl_output
5262 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
5263 ) noexcept
5264{
5265 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = yetani->surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
5266 if(surface_extent.preferred_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel)
5267 {
5268 return;
5269 }
5270
5271 Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
5272
5273 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
5274
5275 Yetani::VectorWlOutput& output_vector = output_data.surface_output_map[wl_surface];
5276
5277 struct wl_output* output_current = output_vector.front();
5278
5279 if(output_current != wl_output)
5280 {
5281 return;
5282 }
5283
5284 Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map.at(wl_output);
5285 Yetani::SizePixel new_size = surface_extent.size_pixel;
5286
5287 if(surface_extent.preferred_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Millimeter)
5288 {
5289 auto p = yetani->convertMmToPixel(output, surface_extent.size_mm.width, surface_extent.size_mm.height);
5290 new_size = { p.first, p.second };
5291 }
5292 else if(surface_extent.preferred_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Percent)
5293 {
5294 auto p = yetani->convertPercentToPixel(output, surface_extent.size_percent.width, surface_extent.size_percent.height);
5295 new_size = { p.first, p.second };
5296 }
5297
5298 if(new_size.width <= 0)
5299 {
5300 new_size.width = 1;
5301 }
5302
5303 if(new_size.height <= 0)
5304 {
5305 new_size.height = 1;
5306 }
5307
5308 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
5309 {
5310 surface_extent.size_pixel = new_size;
5311 surfaceCalculateSize(yetani, wl_surface, new_size);
5312 }
5313 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
5314}
5315
5316// }}}
5317// {{{ Wayland : Seat
5318
5351void Yetani::seatDestroy(struct wl_seat*& wl_seat
5352 ) noexcept
5353{
5354 Yetani::Seat& seat = seat_map[wl_seat];
5355
5356 if(seat.wl_keyboard != nullptr)
5357 {
5358 wl_keyboard_release(seat.wl_keyboard);
5359 seat.wl_keyboard = nullptr;
5360 }
5361
5362 if(seat.wl_pointer != nullptr)
5363 {
5364 wl_pointer_release(seat.wl_pointer);
5365 seat.wl_pointer = nullptr;
5366 }
5367
5368 if(seat.wl_touch != nullptr)
5369 {
5370 wl_touch_release(seat.wl_touch);
5371 seat.wl_touch = nullptr;
5372 }
5373
5374 seat_map.erase(wl_seat);
5375
5376 wl_seat_release(wl_seat);
5377
5378 wl_seat = nullptr;
5379}
5380
5381// }}}
5382// {{{ Wayland : Seat : Keyboard
5383
5457int32_t Yetani::keyRepeatDelay() const noexcept
5458{
5459 return keyboard.repeat_delay;
5460}
5461
5462
5471int32_t Yetani::keyRepeatRate() const noexcept
5472{
5473 return 1000 / keyboard.repeat_rate;
5474}
5475
5476
5480void Yetani::keyboardDestroy(Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard
5481 ) noexcept
5482{
5483 if(keyboard.keymap != nullptr)
5484 {
5485 munmap(keyboard.keymap, keyboard.keymap_size);
5486 }
5487
5488 keyboard.wl_surface = nullptr;
5489 keyboard.event = nullptr;
5490 keyboard.modifier = { 0 };
5491 keyboard.repeat_rate = 0;
5492 keyboard.repeat_delay = {};
5493 keyboard.keymap = nullptr;
5494 keyboard.keymap_size = 0;
5495}
5496
5497
5504void Yetani::keyboardRepeat(Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard
5505 ) noexcept
5506{
5507 auto now = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
5508
5509 for(auto& iter : keyboard.repeat_map)
5510 {
5511 Yetani::KeyRepeatData& key_repeat = iter.second;
5512
5513 if(now >= key_repeat.trigger_time)
5514 {
5515 uint32_t key_code = iter.first;
5516
5517 Yetani::Key key =
5518 { .time = key_repeat.base_time
5519 , .code = key_code
5520 , .state = Yetani::KeyState::Repeat
5521 };
5522
5523 keyboard.event->on_key(key, keyboard.modifier);
5524
5525 key_repeat.trigger_time = now
5526 + std::chrono::milliseconds(keyboard.repeat_rate)
5527 - (now - key_repeat.trigger_time)
5528 ;
5529 key_repeat.base_time += keyboard.repeat_rate;
5530 }
5531 }
5532}
5533
5534
5542void Yetani::keyboardRepeatAdd(Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard
5543 , uint32_t key_code
5544 , uint32_t time
5545 ) noexcept
5546{
5547 auto trigger_time = std::chrono::steady_clock::now()
5548 + std::chrono::milliseconds(keyboard.repeat_delay)
5549 ;
5550
5551 keyboard.repeat_map[key_code] =
5552 { .trigger_time = trigger_time
5553 , .base_time = time + keyboard.repeat_delay
5554 };
5555}
5556
5557
5564void Yetani::keyboardRepeatReleaseAll(Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard
5565 ) noexcept
5566{
5567 while(keyboard.repeat_map.empty() == false)
5568 {
5569 auto iter = keyboard.repeat_map.begin();
5570
5571 uint32_t key_code = iter->first;
5572
5573 Yetani::Key key =
5574 { .time = 0
5575 , .code = key_code
5576 , .state = Yetani::KeyState::Released
5577 };
5578
5579 keyboard.event->on_key(key, keyboard.modifier);
5580
5581 keyboard.repeat_map.erase(iter);
5582 }
5583}
5584
5585
5592void Yetani::keyboardRepeatRemove(Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard
5593 , uint32_t key_code
5594 ) noexcept
5595{
5596 keyboard.repeat_map.erase(key_code);
5597}
5598
5599// }}}
5600// {{{ Wayland : Seat : Pointer
5601
5617void Yetani::pointerClear(Yetani::Pointer& pointer
5618 ) noexcept
5619{
5620 pointer.enter_surface = nullptr;
5621 pointer.enter_point = { 0, 0, 0 };
5622 pointer.leave_surface = nullptr;
5623 pointer.motion_point = { 0, 0, 0 };
5624 pointer.button_event_code = 0;
5625 pointer.button_is_pressed = false;
5626 pointer.button_time = 0;
5627 pointer.axis.time = 0;
5628 pointer.axis.type = Yetani::PointerAxisType::Unknown;
5629 pointer.axis.distance = 0;
5630 pointer.axis.source = Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Unknown;
5631 pointer.axis.steps = 0;
5632}
5633
5634// }}}
5635// {{{ Wayland : Surface
5636
5674void Yetani::surfaceCalculateSize(Yetani* yetani
5675 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
5676 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size
5677 ) noexcept
5678{
5679 Yetani::SurfaceSize& surface_size = yetani->surface_size_map[wl_surface];
5680 surface_size.width = size.width;
5681 surface_size.height = size.height;
5682 surface_size.stride = size.width * surface_size.bytes_per_pixel;
5683 surface_size.in_bytes = surface_size.stride * surface_size.height;
5684
5685 Yetani::SurfaceFrame& surface_frame = yetani->surface_frame_map[wl_surface];
5686 surface_frame.width = size.width;
5687 surface_frame.height = size.height;
5688}
5689
5690
5708struct wl_surface* Yetani::surfaceCreate(Yetani* yetani
5709 , const wl_shm_format pixel_format
5710 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size
5711 , Yetani::Window::Memory& window_memory
5712 ) noexcept
5713{
5714 struct wl_surface* wl_surface = wl_compositor_create_surface(yetani->compositor);
5715
5716 Yetani::SurfaceSize& surface_size = yetani->surface_size_map[wl_surface];
5717 surface_size.pixel_format = pixel_format;
5718 surface_size.bytes_per_pixel = shmFormatBytesPerPixel(pixel_format);
5719
5720 Yetani::SurfaceFrame& surface_frame = yetani->surface_frame_map[wl_surface];
5721 surface_frame.wl_surface = wl_surface;
5722 surface_frame.time_ms = 0;
5723
5724 surfaceCalculateSize(yetani, wl_surface, size);
5725
5726 surface_frame.buffer_next = bufferCreate(surface_size, &window_memory, &yetani->buffer);
5727
5728 // A future configuration setting
5729 bool event_keyboard = true;
5730 if(event_keyboard)
5731 {
5732 yetani->keyboard.event_map[wl_surface] =
5733 { .on_enter = Lambda_DoNothing
5734 , .on_leave = Lambda_DoNothing
5735 , .on_key = LambdaKey_DoNothing
5736 };
5737 }
5738
5739 // A future configuration setting
5740 bool event_pointer = true;
5741 if(event_pointer)
5742 {
5743 yetani->pointer.event_map[wl_surface] =
5744 { .on_axis = LambdaAxis_DoNothing
5745 , .on_axis_discrete = Lambda_DoNothing
5746 , .on_axis_source = Lambda_DoNothing
5747 , .on_axis_stop = Lambda_DoNothing
5748 , .on_button_mm = LambdaButtonMm_DoNothing
5749 , .on_button_percent = LambdaButtonPercent_DoNothing
5750 , .on_button_pixel = LambdaButtonPixel_DoNothing
5751 , .on_enter_mm = LambdaPointMm_DoNothing
5752 , .on_enter_percent = LambdaPointPercent_DoNothing
5753 , .on_enter_pixel = LambdaPointPixel_DoNothing
5754 , .on_leave = Lambda_DoNothing
5755 , .on_motion_mm = LambdaPointMm_DoNothing
5756 , .on_motion_percent = LambdaPointPercent_DoNothing
5757 , .on_motion_pixel = LambdaPointPixel_DoNothing
5758 };
5759 }
5760
5761 yetani->surface_event_map[wl_surface] =
5762 { .on_size_mm_change = LambdaSizeMm_DoNothing
5763 , .on_size_percent_change = LambdaSizePercent_DoNothing
5764 , .on_size_pixel_change = LambdaSizePixel_DoNothing
5765 };
5766
5767 wl_surface_add_listener(wl_surface
5768 , &surface_listener
5769 , yetani
5770 );
5771
5772 return wl_surface;
5773}
5774
5775
5781void Yetani::surfaceDestroy(Yetani* yetani
5782 , struct wl_surface*& wl_surface
5783 ) noexcept
5784{
5785 if(wl_surface == nullptr)
5786 {
5787 return;
5788 }
5789
5790 if(yetani->surface_frame_map.contains(wl_surface))
5791 {
5792 Yetani::SurfaceFrame& surface_frame = yetani->surface_frame_map[wl_surface];
5793
5794 struct wl_buffer* wl_buffer = nullptr;
5795 wl_buffer = surface_frame.buffer_next.exchange(nullptr);
5796
5797 if(wl_buffer != nullptr)
5798 {
5799 bufferDestroy(wl_buffer);
5800 }
5801 }
5802
5803 if(yetani->keyboard.event_map.contains(wl_surface))
5804 {
5805 yetani->keyboard.event_map.erase(wl_surface);
5806 }
5807
5808 if(yetani->pointer.event_map.contains(wl_surface))
5809 {
5810 yetani->pointer.event_map.erase(wl_surface);
5811 }
5812
5813 yetani->surface_size_map.erase(wl_surface);
5814 yetani->surface_frame_map.erase(wl_surface);
5815 yetani->surface_event_map.erase(wl_surface);
5816
5817 yetani->cursorDetach(wl_surface);
5818
5819 wl_surface_destroy(wl_surface);
5820 wl_surface = nullptr;
5821}
5822
5823// }}}
5824// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : Buffer
5825
5838void Yetani::handlerBufferRelease(void* //data
5839 , struct wl_buffer* wl_buffer
5840 ) noexcept
5841{
5842 Yetani::bufferDestroy(wl_buffer);
5843}
5844
5845// }}}
5846// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : Keyboard
5847
5851void Yetani::handlerKeyboardEnter(void* data
5852 , struct wl_keyboard* // wl_keyboard
5853 , uint32_t // serial
5854 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
5855 , struct wl_array* key_array
5856 ) noexcept
5857{
5858 Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard = *((Yetani::Keyboard*)data);
5859
5860 if(keyboard.wl_surface != nullptr)
5861 {
5862 keyboardRepeatReleaseAll(keyboard);
5863
5864 keyboard.event->on_leave();
5865 }
5866
5867 keyboard.wl_surface = wl_surface;
5868
5869 if(keyboard.event_map.contains(wl_surface))
5870 {
5871 keyboard.event = &(keyboard.event_map[wl_surface]);
5872 }
5873 else
5874 {
5875 keyboard.event = &(keyboard.event_map[nullptr]);
5876 }
5877
5878 keyboard.event->on_enter();
5879
5880 if(key_array->size > 0)
5881 {
5882 Yetani::Key key =
5883 { .time = 0
5884 , .code = 0
5885 , .state = Yetani::KeyState::Pressed
5886 };
5887
5888 ZAKERO_YETANI__ARRAY_FOR_EACH(uint32_t*, key_iter, key_array)
5889 {
5890 key.code = *key_iter;
5891
5892 keyboard.event->on_key(key, keyboard.modifier);
5893
5894 keyboardRepeatAdd(keyboard, key.code, 0);
5895 }
5896 }
5897}
5898
5899
5903void Yetani::handlerKeyboardKey(void* data
5904 , struct wl_keyboard* // wl_keyboard
5905 , uint32_t // serial
5906 , uint32_t time
5907 , uint32_t key_code
5908 , uint32_t state
5909 ) noexcept
5910{
5911 Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard = *((Yetani::Keyboard*)data);
5912
5913 Yetani::Key key =
5914 { .time = time
5915 , .code = key_code
5916 , .state = (state == WL_KEYBOARD_KEY_STATE_PRESSED)
5917 ? Yetani::KeyState::Pressed
5918 : Yetani::KeyState::Released
5919 };
5920
5921 keyboard.event->on_key(key, keyboard.modifier);
5922
5923 if(key.state == Yetani::KeyState::Pressed
5924 && keyboard.repeat_rate > 0
5925 )
5926 {
5927 keyboardRepeatAdd(keyboard, key_code, time);
5928 }
5929 else if(key.state == Yetani::KeyState::Released)
5930 {
5931 keyboardRepeatRemove(keyboard, key_code);
5932 }
5933}
5934
5935
5939void Yetani::handlerKeyboardKeymap(void* data
5940 , struct wl_keyboard* // wl_keyboard
5941 , uint32_t format
5942 , int32_t fd
5943 , uint32_t size
5944 ) noexcept
5945{
5946 Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard = *((Yetani::Keyboard*)data);
5947
5948 if(format == WL_KEYBOARD_KEYMAP_FORMAT_XKB_V1)
5949 {
5950 if(keyboard.keymap != nullptr)
5951 {
5952 munmap(keyboard.keymap
5953 , keyboard.keymap_size
5954 );
5955 }
5956
5957 keyboard.keymap = (char*)mmap(nullptr
5958 , size
5959 , PROT_READ
5960 , MAP_NORESERVE | MAP_PRIVATE
5961 , fd
5962 , 0
5963 );
5964 keyboard.keymap_size = size;
5965 }
5966 else // (format == WL_KEYBOARD_KEYMAP_FORMAT_NO_KEYMAP)
5967 {
5968 if(keyboard.keymap != nullptr)
5969 {
5970 munmap(keyboard.keymap
5971 , keyboard.keymap_size
5972 );
5973
5974 keyboard.keymap = nullptr;
5975 keyboard.keymap_size = 0;
5976 }
5977 }
5978}
5979
5980
5984void Yetani::handlerKeyboardLeave(void* data
5985 , struct wl_keyboard* // wl_keyboard
5986 , uint32_t // serial
5987 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
5988 ) noexcept
5989{
5990 Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard = *((Yetani::Keyboard*)data);
5991
5992 if(keyboard.wl_surface == wl_surface)
5993 {
5994 keyboardRepeatReleaseAll(keyboard);
5995
5996 keyboard.event->on_leave();
5997
5998 keyboard.event = &(keyboard.event_map[nullptr]);
5999 keyboard.wl_surface = nullptr;
6000 }
6001}
6002
6003
6007void Yetani::handlerKeyboardModifiers(void* data
6008 , struct wl_keyboard* // wl_keyboard
6009 , uint32_t // serial
6010 , uint32_t mods_pressed
6011 , uint32_t mods_latched
6012 , uint32_t mods_locked
6013 , uint32_t group
6014 ) noexcept
6015{
6016 Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard = *((Yetani::Keyboard*)data);
6017
6018 keyboard.modifier.pressed = mods_pressed;
6019 keyboard.modifier.latched = mods_latched;
6020 keyboard.modifier.locked = mods_locked;
6021 keyboard.modifier.group = group;
6022}
6023
6024
6028void Yetani::handlerKeyboardRepeatInfo(void* data
6029 , struct wl_keyboard* // wl_keyboard
6030 , int32_t rate
6031 , int32_t delay
6032 ) noexcept
6033{
6034 Yetani::Keyboard& keyboard = *((Yetani::Keyboard*)data);
6035
6036 keyboard.repeat_delay = delay;
6037 keyboard.repeat_rate = 1000 / rate;
6038}
6039
6040// }}}
6041// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : Output
6042
6046void Yetani::handlerOutputDone(void* data
6047 , struct wl_output* wl_output
6048 ) noexcept
6049{
6050 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6051 Yetani::Output& output = yetani->output_data.output_map[wl_output];
6052 Yetani::Output& changes = yetani->output_changes_map[wl_output];
6053 Yetani::OutputId output_id = yetani->output_data.wloutput_to_outputid[wl_output];
6054
6082 output = changes;
6083 output.pixels_per_mm_horizontal = output.width / float(output.physical_width_mm);
6084 output.pixels_per_mm_vertical = output.height / float(output.physical_height_mm);
6085
6086 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG << "\n" << to_string(output) << "\n";
6087
6088 switch(yetani->output_state_map[wl_output])
6089 {
6090 case Yetani::OutputState::Done:
6091 // Do Nothing
6092 break;
6093
6094 case Yetani::OutputState::Added:
6095 yetani->on_output_add(output_id);
6096 break;
6097
6098 case Yetani::OutputState::Changed:
6099 yetani->on_output_change(output_id);
6100
6101 for(auto wl_surface : yetani->output_notify_surface_vector)
6102 {
6103 outputNotifySurface(yetani, wl_output, wl_surface);
6104 }
6105
6106 break;
6107 }
6108
6109 yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] = Yetani::OutputState::Done;
6110}
6111
6112
6116void Yetani::handlerOutputGeometry(void* data
6117 , struct wl_output* wl_output
6118 , int32_t x
6119 , int32_t y
6120 , int32_t physical_width
6121 , int32_t physical_height
6122 , int32_t subpixel
6123 , const char* make
6124 , const char* model
6125 , int32_t transform
6126 ) noexcept
6127{
6128 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6129 Yetani::Output& output_changes = yetani->output_changes_map[wl_output];
6130
6131 if(yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] != Yetani::OutputState::Added)
6132 {
6133 yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] = Yetani::OutputState::Changed;
6134 }
6135
6136 output_changes.x = x;
6137 output_changes.y = y;
6138 output_changes.physical_width_mm = physical_width;
6139 output_changes.physical_height_mm = physical_height;
6140 output_changes.subpixel = subpixel;
6141 output_changes.make = std::string(make);
6142 output_changes.model = std::string(model);
6143 output_changes.transform = transform;
6144}
6145
6146
6150void Yetani::handlerOutputMode(void* data
6151 , struct wl_output* wl_output
6152 , uint32_t flags
6153 , int32_t width
6154 , int32_t height
6155 , int32_t refresh
6156 ) noexcept
6157{
6158 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6159 Yetani::Output& output_changes = yetani->output_changes_map[wl_output];
6160
6161 if(yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] != Yetani::OutputState::Added)
6162 {
6163 yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] = Yetani::OutputState::Changed;
6164 }
6165
6166 output_changes.flags = flags;
6167 output_changes.width = width;
6168 output_changes.height = height;
6169 output_changes.refresh_mHz = refresh;
6170}
6171
6172
6176void Yetani::handlerOutputScale(void* data
6177 , struct wl_output* wl_output
6178 , int32_t factor
6179 ) noexcept
6180{
6181 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6182 Output& output_changes = yetani->output_changes_map[wl_output];
6183
6184 if(yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] != Yetani::OutputState::Added)
6185 {
6186 yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] = Yetani::OutputState::Changed;
6187 }
6188
6189 output_changes.scale_factor = factor;
6190}
6191
6192
6196void Yetani::handlerOutputName(void* data
6197 , struct wl_output* wl_output
6198 , const char* name
6199 ) noexcept
6200{
6201 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6202 Output& output_changes = yetani->output_changes_map[wl_output];
6203
6204 if(yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] != Yetani::OutputState::Added)
6205 {
6206 yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] = Yetani::OutputState::Changed;
6207 }
6208
6209 output_changes.name = std::string(name);
6210 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(output_changes.name);
6211}
6212
6213
6217void Yetani::handlerOutputDescription(void* data
6218 , struct wl_output* wl_output
6219 , const char* description
6220 ) noexcept
6221{
6222 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6223 Output& output_changes = yetani->output_changes_map[wl_output];
6224
6225 if(yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] != Yetani::OutputState::Added)
6226 {
6227 yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] = Yetani::OutputState::Changed;
6228 }
6229
6230 output_changes.description = std::string(description);
6231 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(output_changes.description);
6232}
6233
6234// }}}
6235// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : Pointer
6236
6240void Yetani::handlerPointerAxis(void* data
6241 , struct wl_pointer* //wl_pointer ///< The Wayland Pointer
6242 , uint32_t time
6243 , uint32_t axis
6244 , wl_fixed_t value
6245 ) noexcept
6246{
6247 Yetani::Pointer& pointer = *((Yetani::Pointer*)data);
6248
6249 pointer.axis.time = time;
6250 pointer.axis.distance = (float)wl_fixed_to_double(value);
6251
6252 if(axis == WL_POINTER_AXIS_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL)
6253 {
6254 pointer.axis.type = Yetani::PointerAxisType::Horizontal;
6255 }
6256 else if(axis == WL_POINTER_AXIS_VERTICAL_SCROLL)
6257 {
6258 pointer.axis.type = Yetani::PointerAxisType::Vertical;
6259 }
6260 else
6261 {
6262 pointer.axis.type = Yetani::PointerAxisType::Unknown;
6263 }
6264}
6265
6266
6270void Yetani::handlerPointerAxisDiscrete(void* data
6271 , struct wl_pointer* //wl_pointer ///< The Wayland Pointer
6272 , uint32_t //axis ///< The axis
6273 , int32_t discrete
6274 ) noexcept
6275{
6276 Yetani::Pointer& pointer = *((Yetani::Pointer*)data);
6277
6278 pointer.axis.steps = discrete;
6279}
6280
6281
6285void Yetani::handlerPointerAxisSource(void* data
6286 , struct wl_pointer* //wl_pointer ///< The Wayland Pointer
6287 , uint32_t axis_source
6288 ) noexcept
6289{
6290 Yetani::Pointer& pointer = *((Yetani::Pointer*)data);
6291
6292 switch(axis_source)
6293 {
6294 case WL_POINTER_AXIS_SOURCE_WHEEL:
6295 pointer.axis.source = Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Wheel;
6296 break;
6297
6298 case WL_POINTER_AXIS_SOURCE_FINGER:
6299 pointer.axis.source = Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Finger;
6300 break;
6301
6302 case WL_POINTER_AXIS_SOURCE_CONTINUOUS:
6303 pointer.axis.source = Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Continuous;
6304 break;
6305
6306 case WL_POINTER_AXIS_SOURCE_WHEEL_TILT:
6307 pointer.axis.source = Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Wheel_Tilt;
6308 break;
6309
6310 default:
6311 pointer.axis.source = Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Unknown;
6312 }
6313}
6314
6315
6319void Yetani::handlerPointerAxisStop(void*
6320 , struct wl_pointer*
6321 , uint32_t
6322 , uint32_t
6323 ) noexcept
6324{
6325 // --- Ignored ---
6326 //
6327 // Wayland documentation suggests that the "axis stop" can be used for
6328 // kinetic scrolling or to determine when one axis motions begins anew.
6329 //
6330 // This is not needed.
6331 // - For kinetic scrolling: Have the default scrolling be kinetic and
6332 // treat axis input as a new (or additive) velocity.
6333 // - For separation of axis motion, why? If there is a pause in the
6334 // motion, that reflects the user input.
6335}
6336
6337
6341void Yetani::handlerPointerButton(void* data
6342 , struct wl_pointer* //wl_pointer ///< The Wayland Pointer
6343 , uint32_t //serial ///< The Event Id
6344 , uint32_t time
6345 , uint32_t button
6346 , uint32_t state
6347 ) noexcept
6348{
6349 Yetani::Pointer& pointer = *((Yetani::Pointer*)data);
6350
6351 pointer.button.code = button;
6352 pointer.button_time = time;
6353
6354 if(state == WL_POINTER_BUTTON_STATE_RELEASED)
6355 {
6356 pointer.button.state = Yetani::PointerButtonState::Released;
6357 }
6358 else if(state == WL_POINTER_BUTTON_STATE_PRESSED)
6359 {
6360 pointer.button.state = Yetani::PointerButtonState::Pressed;
6361 }
6362}
6363
6364
6368void Yetani::handlerPointerEnter(void* data
6369 , struct wl_pointer* //wl_pointer ///< The Wayland Pointer
6370 , uint32_t serial
6371 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
6372 , wl_fixed_t surface_x
6373 , wl_fixed_t surface_y
6374 ) noexcept
6375{
6376 Yetani::Pointer& pointer = *((Yetani::Pointer*)data);
6377
6378 pointer.enter_serial = serial;
6379 pointer.enter_surface = wl_surface;
6380
6381 pointer.enter_point =
6382 { .time = 0
6383 , .x = wl_fixed_to_int(surface_x)
6384 , .y = wl_fixed_to_int(surface_y)
6385 };
6386}
6387
6388
6392void Yetani::handlerPointerFrame(void* data
6393 , struct wl_pointer* wl_pointer
6394 ) noexcept
6395{
6396 Yetani::Pointer& pointer = *((Yetani::Pointer*)data);
6397 Yetani* yetani = pointer.yetani;
6398
6399 if(pointer.enter_surface != nullptr)
6400 {
6401 if(pointer.wl_surface != nullptr)
6402 {
6403 yetani->cursorLeave(pointer.wl_surface);
6404 pointer.event_map[pointer.wl_surface].on_leave();
6405 }
6406
6407 yetani->cursorEnter(wl_pointer
6408 , pointer.enter_serial
6409 , pointer.enter_surface
6410 );
6411
6412 pointer.wl_surface = pointer.enter_surface;
6413 pointer.point_pixel = pointer.enter_point;
6414
6415 if(pointer.event_map.contains(pointer.wl_surface))
6416 {
6417 pointer.event = &(pointer.event_map[pointer.wl_surface]);
6418 }
6419 else
6420 {
6421 pointer.event = &(pointer.event_map[nullptr]);
6422 }
6423
6424 yetani->convertPixel(pointer.enter_surface
6425 , pointer.point_pixel.x , pointer.point_pixel.y
6426 , pointer.point_mm.x , pointer.point_mm.y
6427 , pointer.point_percent.x, pointer.point_percent.y
6428 );
6429
6430 pointer.event->on_enter_pixel(pointer.point_pixel
6431 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6432 );
6433 pointer.event->on_enter_mm(pointer.point_mm
6434 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6435 );
6436 pointer.event->on_enter_percent(pointer.point_percent
6437 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6438 );
6439 }
6440
6441 if((pointer.motion_point.time != 0)
6442 && (pointer.wl_surface != nullptr)
6443 )
6444 {
6445 pointer.point_pixel = pointer.motion_point;
6446
6447 yetani->convertPixel(pointer.wl_surface
6448 , pointer.point_pixel.x , pointer.point_pixel.y
6449 , pointer.point_mm.x , pointer.point_mm.y
6450 , pointer.point_percent.x, pointer.point_percent.y
6451 );
6452 pointer.point_mm.time = pointer.point_pixel.time;
6453 pointer.point_percent.time = pointer.point_pixel.time;
6454
6455 pointer.event->on_motion_pixel(pointer.point_pixel
6456 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6457 );
6458 pointer.event->on_motion_mm(pointer.point_mm
6459 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6460 );
6461 pointer.event->on_motion_percent(pointer.point_percent
6462 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6463 );
6464 }
6465
6466 if((pointer.button_time != 0)
6467 && (pointer.wl_surface != nullptr)
6468 )
6469 {
6470 pointer.point_mm.time = pointer.button_time;
6471 pointer.point_percent.time = pointer.button_time;
6472 pointer.point_pixel.time = pointer.button_time;
6473
6474 pointer.event->on_button_pixel(pointer.button
6475 , pointer.point_pixel
6476 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6477 );
6478 pointer.event->on_button_mm(pointer.button
6479 , pointer.point_mm
6480 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6481 );
6482 pointer.event->on_button_percent(pointer.button
6483 , pointer.point_percent
6484 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6485 );
6486 }
6487
6488 if((pointer.axis.time != 0)
6489 && (pointer.wl_surface != nullptr)
6490 )
6491 {
6492 pointer.event->on_axis(pointer.axis
6493 , yetani->keyboard.modifier
6494 );
6495 }
6496
6497 if((pointer.leave_surface != nullptr)
6498 && (pointer.leave_surface == pointer.wl_surface)
6499 )
6500 {
6501 yetani->cursorLeave(pointer.leave_surface);
6502
6503 pointer.event->on_leave();
6504
6505 pointer.event = &(pointer.event_map[nullptr]);
6506 pointer.wl_surface = nullptr;
6507 }
6508
6509 pointerClear(pointer);
6510}
6511
6512
6516void Yetani::handlerPointerLeave(void* data
6517 , struct wl_pointer* //wl_pointer ///< The Wayland Pointer
6518 , uint32_t //serial ///< The Event Id
6519 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
6520 ) noexcept
6521{
6522 Yetani::Pointer& pointer = *((Yetani::Pointer*)data);
6523
6524 pointer.leave_surface = wl_surface;
6525}
6526
6527
6531void Yetani::handlerPointerMotion(void* data
6532 , struct wl_pointer* //wl_pointer ///< The Wayland Pointer
6533 , uint32_t time
6534 , wl_fixed_t surface_x
6535 , wl_fixed_t surface_y
6536 ) noexcept
6537{
6538 Yetani::Pointer& pointer = *((Yetani::Pointer*)data);
6539
6540 pointer.motion_point =
6541 { .time = time
6542 , .x = wl_fixed_to_int(surface_x)
6543 , .y = wl_fixed_to_int(surface_y)
6544 };
6545}
6546
6547// }}}
6548// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : Registry
6549
6553void Yetani::handlerRegistryGlobal(void* data
6554 , struct wl_registry* registry
6555 , uint32_t id
6556 , const char* interface
6557 , uint32_t version
6558 ) noexcept
6559{
6560 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6561
6562 std::string_view interface_name(interface);
6563 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(interface_name);
6564
6565 if(interface_name == wl_compositor_interface.name)
6566 {
6567 yetani->compositor = (struct wl_compositor*)
6568 wl_registry_bind(registry
6569 , id
6570 , &wl_compositor_interface
6571 , 1
6572 );
6573
6574 return;
6575 }
6576
6577 if(interface_name == wl_output_interface.name)
6578 {
6579 struct wl_output* wl_output = (struct wl_output*)wl_registry_bind(registry
6580 , id
6581 , &wl_output_interface
6582 , 2
6583 );
6584
6585 yetani->output_data.wloutput_to_outputid[wl_output] = id;
6586 yetani->output_data.outputid_to_wloutput[id] = wl_output;
6587 yetani->output_data.output_map[wl_output] = {};
6588 yetani->output_changes_map[wl_output] = {};
6589 yetani->output_state_map[wl_output] = Yetani::OutputState::Added;
6590
6591 wl_output_add_listener(wl_output
6592 , &Yetani::output_listener
6593 , yetani
6594 );
6595
6596 return;
6597 }
6598
6599 if(interface_name == wl_seat_interface.name)
6600 {
6601 yetani->seat = (struct wl_seat*)
6602 wl_registry_bind(registry
6603 , id
6604 , &wl_seat_interface
6605 , version
6606 );
6607
6608 yetani->id_to_seat[id] = yetani->seat;
6609
6610 wl_seat_add_listener(yetani->seat
6611 , &yetani->seat_listener
6612 , yetani
6613 );
6614
6615 return;
6616 }
6617
6618 if(interface_name == wl_shm_interface.name)
6619 {
6620 yetani->shm = (struct wl_shm*)
6621 wl_registry_bind(registry
6622 , id
6623 , &wl_shm_interface
6624 , version
6625 );
6626
6627 wl_shm_add_listener(yetani->shm
6628 , &yetani->shm_listener
6629 , yetani
6630 );
6631
6632 return;
6633 }
6634
6635 if(interface_name == xdg_wm_base_interface.name)
6636 {
6637 yetani->xdg_wm_base = (struct xdg_wm_base*)
6638 wl_registry_bind(registry
6639 , id
6640 , &xdg_wm_base_interface
6641 , 1
6642 );
6643
6644 xdg_wm_base_add_listener(yetani->xdg_wm_base
6645 , &yetani->xdg_wm_base_listener
6646 , yetani
6647 );
6648 }
6649
6650 if(interface_name == zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_interface.name)
6651 {
6652 yetani->decoration_manager = (struct zxdg_decoration_manager_v1*)
6653 wl_registry_bind(registry
6654 , id
6655 , &zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_interface
6656 , 1
6657 );
6658 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG << "--- Using UNSTABLE Decoration Manager ---\n";
6659 }
6660}
6661
6662
6666void Yetani::handlerRegistryRemove(void* data
6667 , struct wl_registry* //registry ///< The registry object
6668 , uint32_t id
6669 ) noexcept
6670{
6671 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6672
6673 printf("Got a registry remove event for id %d\n", id);
6674
6675 // Output
6676 {
6677 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(yetani->output_data.mutex);
6678
6679 if(yetani->output_data.outputid_to_wloutput.contains(id))
6680 {
6681 struct wl_output* wl_output = yetani->output_data.outputid_to_wloutput[id];
6682
6683 yetani->output_data.outputid_to_wloutput.erase(id);
6684 yetani->output_data.wloutput_to_outputid.erase(wl_output);
6685
6686 yetani->output_changes_map.erase(wl_output);
6687 yetani->output_state_map.erase(wl_output);
6688
6689 yetani->on_output_remove(id);
6690 yetani->output_data.output_map.erase(wl_output);
6691
6692 return;
6693 }
6694 }
6695
6696 // Seat
6697 {
6698 if(yetani->id_to_seat.contains(id))
6699 {
6700 struct wl_seat* wl_seat = yetani->id_to_seat[id];
6701
6702 yetani->seatDestroy(wl_seat);
6703
6704 yetani->id_to_seat.erase(id);
6705 }
6706 }
6707}
6708
6709// }}}
6710// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : Seat
6711
6719void Yetani::handlerSeatCapabilities(void* data
6720 , struct wl_seat* wl_seat
6721 , uint32_t capabilities
6722 ) noexcept
6723{
6724 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR((uint64_t)wl_seat);
6725
6726 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6727 Yetani::Seat& seat = yetani->seat_map[wl_seat];
6728
6729 seat.version = wl_seat_get_version(wl_seat);
6730
6731 if(capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_KEYBOARD)
6732 {
6733 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG << "-- Got a keyboard device --\n";
6734
6735 yetani->keyboard.event_map[nullptr] =
6736 { .on_enter = Lambda_DoNothing
6737 , .on_leave = Lambda_DoNothing
6738 , .on_key = LambdaKey_DoNothing
6739 };
6740
6741 yetani->keyboard.event = &(yetani->keyboard.event_map[nullptr]);
6742
6743 seat.wl_keyboard = wl_seat_get_keyboard(wl_seat);
6744
6745 wl_keyboard_add_listener(seat.wl_keyboard
6746 , &Yetani::keyboard_listener
6747 , &yetani->keyboard
6748 );
6749 }
6750
6751 if(capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_POINTER)
6752 {
6753 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG << "-- Got a pointer device --\n";
6754
6755 yetani->pointer.yetani = yetani;
6756
6757 yetani->pointer.event_map[nullptr] =
6758 { .on_axis = LambdaAxis_DoNothing
6759 , .on_axis_discrete = Lambda_DoNothing
6760 , .on_axis_source = Lambda_DoNothing
6761 , .on_axis_stop = Lambda_DoNothing
6762 , .on_button_mm = LambdaButtonMm_DoNothing
6763 , .on_button_percent = LambdaButtonPercent_DoNothing
6764 , .on_button_pixel = LambdaButtonPixel_DoNothing
6765 , .on_enter_mm = LambdaPointMm_DoNothing
6766 , .on_enter_percent = LambdaPointPercent_DoNothing
6767 , .on_enter_pixel = LambdaPointPixel_DoNothing
6768 , .on_leave = Lambda_DoNothing
6769 , .on_motion_mm = LambdaPointMm_DoNothing
6770 , .on_motion_percent = LambdaPointPercent_DoNothing
6771 , .on_motion_pixel = LambdaPointPixel_DoNothing
6772 };
6773
6774 yetani->pointer.event = &(yetani->pointer.event_map[nullptr]);
6775
6776 seat.wl_pointer = wl_seat_get_pointer(wl_seat);
6777
6778 wl_pointer_add_listener(seat.wl_pointer
6779 , &Yetani::pointer_listener
6780 , &yetani->pointer
6781 );
6782 }
6783
6784 if(capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_TOUCH)
6785 {
6786 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG << "-- Got a touch device --\n";
6787 seat.wl_touch = wl_seat_get_touch(wl_seat);
6788
6789 //wl_touch_add_listener(seat.wl_touch
6790 // , &Yetani::touch_listener
6791 // , data
6792 // );
6793 }
6794}
6795
6796
6800void Yetani::handlerSeatName(void* data
6801 , struct wl_seat* wl_seat
6802 , const char* name
6803 ) noexcept
6804{
6805 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR((uint64_t)wl_seat);
6806 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(name);
6807
6808 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6809
6810 yetani->seat_map[wl_seat].name = name;
6811}
6812
6813// }}}
6814// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : SHM
6815
6819void Yetani::handlerShmFormat(void* data
6820 , struct wl_shm* /* Unused */
6821 , uint32_t value
6822 ) noexcept
6823{
6824 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6825
6826 wl_shm_format format = (wl_shm_format)value;
6827
6828 if(vectorContains(yetani->shm_format_vector, format))
6829 {
6830 return;
6831 }
6832
6833 yetani->shm_format_vector.push_back(format);
6834}
6835
6836// }}}
6837// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : Surface
6838
6842void Yetani::handlerSurfaceEnter(void* data
6843 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
6844 , struct wl_output* wl_output
6845 ) noexcept
6846{
6847 //ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG << "-------------------------------------------\n";
6848 //ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(data);
6849 //ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(wl_surface);
6850 //ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(wl_output);
6851
6852 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6853 Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
6854
6855 output_data.mutex.lock();
6856 output_data.surface_output_map[wl_surface].push_back(wl_output);
6857 output_data.mutex.unlock();
6858}
6859
6860
6864void Yetani::handlerSurfaceLeave(void* data
6865 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
6866 , struct wl_output* wl_output
6867 ) noexcept
6868{
6869 //ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG << "-------------------------------------------\n";
6870 //ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(data);
6871 //ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(wl_surface);
6872 //ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG_VAR(wl_output);
6873
6874 Yetani* yetani = (Yetani*)data;
6875
6876 Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
6877 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
6878
6879 Yetani::VectorWlOutput& output_vector = output_data.surface_output_map[wl_surface];
6880
6881 // Save the current wl_output device id
6882 struct wl_output* current_output = output_vector.front();
6883
6884 // Remove the wl_output device id
6885 zakero::vectorErase(output_vector, wl_output);
6886
6887 // Check if the current wl_output device id was removed
6888 if(current_output == output_vector.front())
6889 {
6890 // Current wl_output device was not removed
6891 // so nothing to do.
6892
6893 return;
6894 }
6895
6896 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = yetani->surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
6897
6898 if(surface_extent.preferred_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel)
6899 {
6900 return;
6901 }
6902
6903 // Convert the relative window size from the old wl_output device
6904 // to the new wl_output device.
6905
6906 current_output = output_vector.front();
6907
6908 Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map.at(current_output);
6909 Yetani::SizePixel new_size;
6910
6911 if(surface_extent.preferred_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Millimeter)
6912 {
6913 auto p = yetani->convertMmToPixel(output
6914 , surface_extent.size_mm.width
6915 , surface_extent.size_mm.height
6916 );
6917
6918 new_size = { p.first, p.second };
6919 }
6920 else // if(surface_extent.preferred_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Percent)
6921 {
6922 auto p = yetani->convertPercentToPixel(output
6923 , surface_extent.size_percent.width
6924 , surface_extent.size_percent.height
6925 );
6926
6927 new_size = { p.first, p.second };
6928 }
6929
6930 if(new_size.width <= 0)
6931 {
6932 new_size.width = 1;
6933 }
6934
6935 if(new_size.height <= 0)
6936 {
6937 new_size.height = 1;
6938 }
6939
6940 if((new_size.width != surface_extent.size_pixel.width)
6941 && (new_size.height != surface_extent.size_pixel.height)
6942 )
6943 {
6944 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
6945 {
6946 XdgSurface& surface = yetani->xdg_surface_map[wl_surface];
6947
6948 surface_extent.size_pixel = new_size;
6949 surfaceCalculateSize(surface.yetani, surface.wl_surface, new_size);
6950 }
6951 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
6952
6953 Yetani::SurfaceEvent& event = yetani->surface_event_map[wl_surface];
6954 event.on_size_pixel_change(surface_extent.size_pixel);
6955 }
6956}
6957
6958// }}}
6959// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers : SwapBuffers
6960
6964void Yetani::handlerSwapBuffers(void* data
6965 , struct wl_callback* callback
6966 , uint32_t time_ms
6967 ) noexcept
6968{
6969 Yetani::SurfaceFrame* surface_frame = (Yetani::SurfaceFrame*)data;
6970
6971 wl_callback_destroy(callback);
6972
6973 callback = wl_surface_frame(surface_frame->wl_surface);
6974
6975 wl_callback_add_listener(callback
6976 , &frame_callback_listener
6977 , data
6978 );
6979
6980 struct wl_buffer* wl_buffer = surface_frame->buffer_next.exchange(nullptr);
6981 if(wl_buffer != nullptr)
6982 {
6983 wl_buffer_add_listener(wl_buffer
6984 , &Yetani::buffer_listener
6985 , wl_buffer_get_user_data(wl_buffer)
6986 );
6987
6988 surface_frame->time_ms = time_ms;
6989
6990 wl_surface_attach(surface_frame->wl_surface, wl_buffer, 0, 0);
6991
6992 wl_surface_damage(surface_frame->wl_surface
6993 , 0, 0
6994 , surface_frame->width, surface_frame->height
6995 );
6996 }
6997
6998 wl_surface_commit(surface_frame->wl_surface);
6999}
7000
7001// }}}
7002// {{{ Wayland : Listener Handlers (Unstable)
7003
7004
7005// }}}
7006// {{{ XDG
7007
7020Yetani::WindowMode Yetani::toWindowMode(const Yetani::XdgState state
7021 ) noexcept
7022{
7023 switch(state)
7024 {
7025 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Fullscreen:
7026 return Yetani::WindowMode::Fullscreen;
7027
7028 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Maximized:
7029 return Yetani::WindowMode::Maximized;
7030
7031 default:
7032 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Normal:
7033 return Yetani::WindowMode::Normal;
7034 }
7035}
7036
7037
7043Yetani::XdgState Yetani::toXdgState(const Yetani::WindowMode window_mode
7044 ) noexcept
7045{
7046 switch(window_mode)
7047 {
7048 case Yetani::WindowMode::Fullscreen:
7049 return Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Fullscreen;
7050
7051 case Yetani::WindowMode::Maximized:
7052 return Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Maximized;
7053
7054 default:
7055 case Yetani::WindowMode::Normal:
7056 return Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Normal;
7057 }
7058}
7059
7060// }}}
7061// {{{ XDG : Surface
7062
7083struct xdg_surface* Yetani::xdgSurfaceCreate(struct wl_surface* wl_surface
7084 ) noexcept
7085{
7086 XdgSurface& surface = xdg_surface_map[wl_surface];
7087
7088 surface.yetani = this;
7089 surface.wl_surface = wl_surface;
7090
7091 surface_extent_mutex.lock();
7092 {
7093 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
7094
7095 surface_extent.preferred_unit = Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel;
7096 surface_extent.preferred_mm = { 160, 90 }; // 16:9 * 10mm
7097 surface_extent.preferred_percent = { 0.32, 0.18 }; // 16:9 * 0.02
7098 surface_extent.size_mm = { 160, 90 }; // 16:9 + 10mm
7099 surface_extent.size_percent = { 0.32, 0.18 }; // 16:9 * 0.02
7100 surface_extent.size_pixel = { 800, 450 }; // 16:9 * 50 pixels
7101 surface_extent.size_pixel_max = { 0, 0 }; // No maximum size
7102 surface_extent.size_pixel_min = { 0, 0 }; // No minimum size
7103 }
7104 surface_extent_mutex.unlock();
7105
7106 output_notify_surface_vector.push_back(wl_surface);
7107
7108 struct xdg_surface* xdg_surface = xdg_wm_base_get_xdg_surface(xdg_wm_base
7109 , wl_surface
7110 );
7111
7112 xdg_state_change_mutex.lock();
7113 {
7114 xdg_state_change_map[xdg_surface] = {};
7115 }
7116 xdg_state_change_mutex.unlock();
7117
7118 xdg_surface_add_listener(xdg_surface
7119 , &xdg_surface_listener
7120 , &surface
7121 );
7122
7123 return xdg_surface;
7124}
7125
7126
7135void Yetani::xdgSurfaceDestroy(struct wl_surface* wl_surface
7136 , struct xdg_surface*& xdg_surface
7137 ) noexcept
7138{
7139 if(xdg_surface)
7140 {
7141 xdg_surface_destroy(xdg_surface);
7142 }
7143
7144 zakero::vectorErase(output_notify_surface_vector, wl_surface);
7145
7146 if(xdg_surface_map.contains(wl_surface))
7147 {
7148 xdg_surface_map.erase(wl_surface);
7149 }
7150
7151 xdg_state_change_mutex.lock();
7152 {
7153 if(xdg_state_change_map.contains(xdg_surface))
7154 {
7155 xdg_state_change_map.erase(xdg_surface);
7156 }
7157 }
7158 xdg_state_change_mutex.unlock();
7159
7160 surface_extent_mutex.lock();
7161 {
7162 if(surface_extent_map.contains(wl_surface))
7163 {
7164 surface_extent_map.erase(wl_surface);
7165 }
7166 }
7167 surface_extent_mutex.unlock();
7168
7169 xdg_surface = nullptr;
7170}
7171
7172
7176void Yetani::xdgSurfaceSetExtent(struct wl_surface* wl_surface
7177 , const Yetani::SizeUnit& size_unit
7178 , const Yetani::SizeMm& size_mm
7179 , const Yetani::SizePercent& size_percent
7180 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size_pixel
7181 ) noexcept
7182{
7183 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
7184
7185 surface_extent.preferred_unit = size_unit;
7186 surface_extent.preferred_mm = size_mm;
7187 surface_extent.preferred_percent = size_percent;
7188 surface_extent.size_mm = size_mm;
7189 surface_extent.size_percent = size_percent;
7190 surface_extent.size_pixel = size_pixel;
7191 surface_extent.size_pixel_max = { 0, 0 };
7192 surface_extent.size_pixel_min = { 0, 0 };
7193}
7194
7195// }}}
7196// {{{ XDG : Toplevel
7197
7236struct xdg_toplevel* Yetani::xdgToplevelCreate(struct xdg_surface* xdg_surface
7237 ) noexcept
7238{
7239 Yetani::XdgToplevel& toplevel = xdg_toplevel_map[xdg_surface];
7240
7241 toplevel.close_request_lambda = Lambda_DoNothing;
7242 toplevel.state_change = &(xdg_state_change_map[xdg_surface]);
7243 toplevel.is_active = false;
7244 toplevel.window_state = Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Normal;
7245 toplevel.is_active_lambda = LambdaBool_DoNothing;
7246 toplevel.window_state_lambda = LambdaWindowMode_DoNothing;
7247 toplevel.previous_size = { 0, 0 };
7248 toplevel.xdg_toplevel = nullptr;
7249
7255 toplevel.state_change->push_back(Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Attach_Buffer);
7256
7257 struct xdg_toplevel* xdg_toplevel = nullptr;
7258
7259 xdg_toplevel = xdg_surface_get_toplevel(xdg_surface);
7260 toplevel.xdg_toplevel = xdg_toplevel;
7261
7262 xdg_toplevel_add_listener(xdg_toplevel
7263 , &xdg_toplevel_listener
7264 , &toplevel
7265 );
7266
7267 return xdg_toplevel;
7268}
7269
7270
7277void Yetani::xdgToplevelDestroy(struct xdg_surface* xdg_surface
7278 , struct xdg_toplevel*& xdg_toplevel
7279 ) noexcept
7280{
7281 if(xdg_toplevel != nullptr)
7282 {
7283 xdg_toplevel_destroy(xdg_toplevel);
7284 }
7285
7286 if(xdg_toplevel_map.contains(xdg_surface))
7287 {
7288 XdgToplevel& toplevel = xdg_toplevel_map[xdg_surface];
7289
7290 toplevel.close_request_lambda = nullptr;
7291 toplevel.state_change = nullptr;
7292 toplevel.window_state = Yetani::XdgState::Unknown;
7293 toplevel.is_active = false;
7294 toplevel.is_active_lambda = nullptr;
7295 toplevel.window_state_lambda = nullptr;
7296
7297 xdg_toplevel_map.erase(xdg_surface);
7298 }
7299
7300 xdg_toplevel = nullptr;
7301}
7302
7303
7313void Yetani::xdgToplevelSizeChange(Yetani* yetani
7314 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
7315 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size_pixel
7316 ) noexcept
7317{
7318 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = yetani->surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
7319 Yetani::SizePixel new_size = surface_extent.size_pixel;
7320
7321 if(((surface_extent.size_pixel_min.width == 0) || (size_pixel.width >= surface_extent.size_pixel_min.width))
7322 && ((surface_extent.size_pixel_max.width == 0) || (size_pixel.width <= surface_extent.size_pixel_max.width))
7323 )
7324 {
7325 new_size.width = size_pixel.width;
7326 }
7327
7328 if(((surface_extent.size_pixel_min.height == 0) || (size_pixel.height >= surface_extent.size_pixel_min.height))
7329 && ((surface_extent.size_pixel_max.height == 0) || (size_pixel.height <= surface_extent.size_pixel_max.height))
7330 )
7331 {
7332 new_size.height = size_pixel.height;
7333 }
7334
7335 if((new_size.width == surface_extent.size_pixel.width)
7336 && (new_size.height == surface_extent.size_pixel.height)
7337 )
7338 {
7339 return;
7340 }
7341
7342 // Calculate Sizes
7343 Yetani::SizeMm size_mm;
7344 Yetani::SizePercent size_percent;
7345 yetani->convertPixel(wl_surface
7346 , size_pixel.width , size_pixel.height
7347 , size_mm.width , size_mm.height
7348 , size_percent.width, size_percent.height
7349 );
7350
7351 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
7352 {
7353 surface_extent.size_pixel = new_size;
7354 surfaceCalculateSize(yetani, wl_surface, new_size);
7355 }
7356 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
7357
7358 Yetani::SurfaceEvent& event = yetani->surface_event_map[wl_surface];
7359 event.on_size_pixel_change(surface_extent.size_pixel);
7360 event.on_size_mm_change(surface_extent.size_mm);
7361 event.on_size_percent_change(surface_extent.size_percent);
7362}
7363
7364
7368void Yetani::xdgToplevelSizeMinMaxChange(Yetani* yetani
7369 , struct xdg_toplevel* xdg_toplevel
7370 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
7371 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size_pixel_min
7372 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size_pixel_max
7373 ) noexcept
7374{
7375 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = yetani->surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
7376
7377 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel = surface_extent.size_pixel;
7378 bool need_to_resize = false;
7379
7380 if(size_pixel_max.width > 0
7381 && size_pixel_max.width < surface_extent.size_pixel.width
7382 )
7383 {
7384 need_to_resize = true;
7385 size_pixel.width = size_pixel_max.width;
7386 }
7387
7388 if(size_pixel_max.height > 0
7389 && size_pixel_max.height < surface_extent.size_pixel.height
7390 )
7391 {
7392 need_to_resize = true;
7393 size_pixel.height = size_pixel_max.height;
7394 }
7395
7396 if(size_pixel_min.width > 0
7397 && size_pixel_min.width > surface_extent.size_pixel.width
7398 )
7399 {
7400 need_to_resize = true;
7401 size_pixel.width = size_pixel_min.width;
7402 }
7403
7404 if(size_pixel_min.height > 0
7405 && size_pixel_min.height > surface_extent.size_pixel.height
7406 )
7407 {
7408 need_to_resize = true;
7409 size_pixel.height = size_pixel_min.height;
7410 }
7411
7412 if(need_to_resize)
7413 {
7414 xdg_toplevel_set_max_size(xdg_toplevel, 0, 0);
7415 xdg_toplevel_set_min_size(xdg_toplevel, 0, 0);
7416
7417 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
7418 {
7419 surface_extent.size_pixel = size_pixel;
7420 surfaceCalculateSize(yetani, wl_surface, size_pixel);
7421 }
7422 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
7423 }
7424
7425 xdg_toplevel_set_min_size(xdg_toplevel
7426 , size_pixel_min.width
7427 , size_pixel_min.height
7428 );
7429
7430 xdg_toplevel_set_max_size(xdg_toplevel
7431 , size_pixel_max.width
7432 , size_pixel_max.height
7433 );
7434
7435 surface_extent.size_pixel_min = size_pixel_min;
7436 surface_extent.size_pixel_max = size_pixel_max;
7437}
7438
7439
7443void Yetani::xdgToplevelWindowChange(Yetani* yetani
7444 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
7445 , Yetani::XdgToplevel& toplevel
7446 , const Yetani::XdgState window_state
7447 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size_pixel
7448 ) noexcept
7449{
7450 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = yetani->surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
7451 Yetani::SizePixel new_size{1, 1};
7452
7453 toplevel.window_state = window_state;
7454
7455 if((toplevel.window_state == Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Fullscreen)
7456 || (toplevel.window_state == Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Maximized)
7457 )
7458 {
7459 if(toplevel.previous_size.width == 0)
7460 {
7461 xdg_toplevel_set_max_size(toplevel.xdg_toplevel, 0, 0);
7462 xdg_toplevel_set_min_size(toplevel.xdg_toplevel, 0, 0);
7463
7464 toplevel.previous_size = surface_extent.size_pixel;
7465 }
7466
7467 if((size_pixel.width != 0)
7468 && (size_pixel.height != 0)
7469 )
7470 {
7471 new_size = size_pixel;
7472 }
7473 }
7474 else if(toplevel.window_state == Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Normal)
7475 {
7476 xdg_toplevel_set_max_size(toplevel.xdg_toplevel
7477 , surface_extent.size_pixel_max.width
7478 , surface_extent.size_pixel_max.height
7479 );
7480
7481 xdg_toplevel_set_min_size(toplevel.xdg_toplevel
7482 , surface_extent.size_pixel_min.width
7483 , surface_extent.size_pixel_min.height
7484 );
7485
7486 new_size = toplevel.previous_size;
7487 toplevel.previous_size.width = 0;
7488 }
7489
7490 if(new_size == surface_extent.size_pixel)
7491 {
7492 return;
7493 }
7494
7495 // Calculate Size
7496 Yetani::SizeMm size_mm;
7497 Yetani::SizePercent size_percent;
7498 yetani->convertPixel(wl_surface
7499 , size_pixel.width , size_pixel.height
7500 , size_mm.width , size_mm.height
7501 , size_percent.width, size_percent.height
7502 );
7503
7504 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
7505 {
7506 surface_extent.size_mm = size_mm;
7507 surface_extent.size_percent = size_percent;
7508 surface_extent.size_pixel = new_size;
7509 surfaceCalculateSize(yetani, wl_surface, new_size);
7510 }
7511 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
7512
7513 toplevel.window_state_lambda(Yetani::toWindowMode(toplevel.window_state));
7514
7515 Yetani::SurfaceEvent& event = yetani->surface_event_map[wl_surface];
7516 event.on_size_pixel_change(surface_extent.size_pixel);
7517 event.on_size_mm_change(surface_extent.size_mm);
7518 event.on_size_percent_change(surface_extent.size_percent);
7519}
7520
7521// }}}
7522// {{{ XDG : Decoration (Unstable)
7523
7547struct zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1* Yetani::xdgDecorationCreate(struct xdg_surface* xdg_surface
7548 , struct xdg_toplevel* xdg_toplevel
7549 ) noexcept
7550{
7551 if(decoration_manager == nullptr)
7552 {
7553 return nullptr;
7554 }
7555
7556 /* *** From the xdg-decoration-unstable-v1 documentation ***
7557 *
7558 * Creating an xdg_toplevel_decoration from an xdg_toplevel which has a
7559 * buffer attached or committed is a client error.
7560 */
7561
7562 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1* xdg_decoration =
7563 zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_get_toplevel_decoration(decoration_manager
7564 , xdg_toplevel
7565 );
7566
7567 Yetani::XdgDecoration& decoration = xdg_decoration_map[xdg_surface];
7568 decoration.state_change = &(xdg_state_change_map[xdg_surface]);
7569 decoration.lambda = LambdaWindowDecorations_DoNothing;
7570 decoration.state = 0;
7571 decoration.is_present = false;
7572
7573 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_add_listener(xdg_decoration
7574 , &xdg_toplevel_decoration_listener
7575 , &decoration
7576 );
7577
7578 return xdg_decoration;
7579}
7580
7581
7587void Yetani::xdgDecorationDestroy(struct xdg_surface* xdg_surface
7588 , struct xdg_toplevel* //xdg_toplevel ///< The XDG Toplevel
7589 , struct zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1*& xdg_decoration
7590 ) noexcept
7591{
7592 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_destroy(xdg_decoration);
7593
7594 if(xdg_decoration_map.contains(xdg_surface))
7595 {
7596 Yetani::XdgDecoration& decoration = xdg_decoration_map[xdg_surface];
7597 decoration.state_change = nullptr;
7598 decoration.lambda = nullptr;
7599 decoration.state = 0;
7600 decoration.is_present = false;
7601
7602 xdg_decoration_map.erase(xdg_surface);
7603 }
7604
7605 xdg_decoration = nullptr;
7606}
7607
7608
7614void Yetani::xdgDecorationChange(Yetani::XdgDecoration& decoration
7615 , const uint32_t decoration_state
7616 ) noexcept
7617{
7618 if(decoration_state == ZXDG_TOPLEVEL_DECORATION_V1_MODE_CLIENT_SIDE)
7619 {
7620 if(decoration.state != decoration_state)
7621 {
7622 decoration.state = decoration_state;
7623 decoration.is_present = false;
7624
7625 decoration.lambda(
7626 Yetani::WindowDecorations::Client_Side
7627 );
7628 }
7629 }
7630 else if(decoration_state == ZXDG_TOPLEVEL_DECORATION_V1_MODE_SERVER_SIDE)
7631 {
7632 if(decoration.state != decoration_state)
7633 {
7634 decoration.state = decoration_state;
7635 decoration.is_present = true;
7636 }
7637 else
7638 {
7639 decoration.is_present = !decoration.is_present;
7640 }
7641
7642 if(decoration.is_present == true)
7643 {
7644 decoration.lambda(
7645 Yetani::WindowDecorations::Server_Side
7646 );
7647 }
7648 else
7649 {
7650 decoration.lambda(
7651 Yetani::WindowDecorations::Client_Side
7652 );
7653 }
7654 }
7655}
7656
7657// }}}
7658// {{{ XDG : Listener Handlers : Surface
7659
7673void Yetani::handlerXdgSurfaceConfigure(void* data
7674 , xdg_surface* xdg_surface
7675 , uint32_t serial
7676 ) noexcept
7677{
7678 Yetani::XdgSurface& surface = *((Yetani::XdgSurface*)data);
7679 Yetani* yetani = surface.yetani;
7680
7681 xdg_surface_ack_configure(xdg_surface, serial);
7682
7683 VectorXdgStateChange& state_change = yetani->xdg_state_change_map[xdg_surface];
7684
7685 if(state_change.empty())
7686 {
7687 return;
7688 }
7689
7690 auto iter = std::begin(state_change);
7691 auto iter_end = std::end(state_change);
7692
7693 while(iter != iter_end)
7694 {
7695 switch(*iter)
7696 {
7697 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Active:
7698 {
7699 Yetani::XdgToplevel& toplevel = yetani->xdg_toplevel_map[xdg_surface];
7700
7701 iter++;
7702 bool is_active = bool(*iter);
7703 if(toplevel.is_active != is_active)
7704 {
7705 toplevel.is_active = is_active;
7706
7707 toplevel.is_active_lambda(is_active);
7708 }
7709 } break;
7710
7711 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Attach_Buffer:
7712 {
7713 struct wl_surface* wl_surface = surface.wl_surface;
7714
7715 SurfaceFrame& surface_frame =
7716 yetani->surface_frame_map[wl_surface];
7717
7718 wl_surface_attach(surface_frame.wl_surface
7719 , surface_frame.buffer_next
7720 , 0, 0
7721 );
7722
7723 struct wl_callback* callback = wl_surface_frame(surface_frame.wl_surface);
7724
7725 wl_callback_add_listener(callback
7726 , &frame_callback_listener
7727 , &surface_frame
7728 );
7729
7730 wl_surface_commit(surface_frame.wl_surface);
7731 } break;
7732
7733 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Normal:
7734 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Maximized:
7735 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Fullscreen:
7736 {
7737 struct wl_surface* wl_surface = surface.wl_surface;
7738
7739 Yetani::XdgToplevel& toplevel = yetani->xdg_toplevel_map[xdg_surface];
7740
7741 Yetani::XdgState window_state = XdgState(*iter);
7742
7743 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel;
7744
7745 iter++;
7746 size_pixel.width = *iter;
7747
7748 iter++;
7749 size_pixel.height = *iter;
7750
7751 if(toplevel.window_state != window_state)
7752 {
7753 xdgToplevelWindowChange(yetani
7754 , wl_surface
7755 , toplevel
7756 , window_state
7757 , size_pixel
7758 );
7759 }
7760 } break;
7761
7762 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Resizing:
7763 {
7764 struct wl_surface* wl_surface = surface.wl_surface;
7765
7766 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel;
7767
7768 iter++;
7769 size_pixel.width = *iter;
7770
7771 iter++;
7772 size_pixel.height = *iter;
7773
7774 if(size_pixel.width > 0
7775 && size_pixel.height > 0
7776 )
7777 {
7778 xdgToplevelSizeChange(yetani
7779 , wl_surface
7780 , size_pixel
7781 );
7782 }
7783 } break;
7784
7785 case Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Decoration:
7786 {
7787 iter++;
7788 uint32_t decoration_state = *iter;
7789
7790 Yetani::XdgDecoration& decoration = yetani->xdg_decoration_map[xdg_surface];
7791
7792 xdgDecorationChange(decoration, decoration_state);
7793 } break;
7794 }
7795
7796 iter++;
7797 }
7798
7799 state_change.clear();
7800}
7801
7802// }}}
7803// {{{ XDG : Listener Handlers : Toplevel
7804
7808void Yetani::handlerXdgToplevelClose(void* data
7809 , struct xdg_toplevel* //xdg_toplevel ///< The toplevel surface
7810 ) noexcept
7811{
7812 Yetani::XdgToplevel* toplevel = (Yetani::XdgToplevel*)data;
7813
7814 toplevel->close_request_lambda();
7815}
7816
7817
7821void Yetani::handlerXdgToplevelConfigure(void* data
7822 , struct xdg_toplevel* //xdg_toplevel ///< The toplevel surface
7823 , int32_t width
7824 , int32_t height
7825 , struct wl_array* state_array
7826 ) noexcept
7827{
7828 Yetani::XdgToplevel* toplevel = (Yetani::XdgToplevel*)data;
7829
7830 Yetani::XdgState window_state = Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Normal;
7831 int32_t is_active = 0;
7832
7833 ZAKERO_YETANI__ARRAY_FOR_EACH(xdg_toplevel_state*, state_iter, state_array)
7834 {
7835 xdg_toplevel_state state = *state_iter;
7836
7837 switch(state)
7838 {
7839 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_MAXIMIZED:
7840 window_state = Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Maximized;
7841 break;
7842 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_FULLSCREEN:
7843 window_state = Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Window_Fullscreen;
7844 break;
7845 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_RESIZING:
7846 toplevel->state_change->push_back(Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Resizing);
7847 toplevel->state_change->push_back(width);
7848 toplevel->state_change->push_back(height);
7849 break;
7850 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_ACTIVATED:
7851 is_active = 1;
7852 break;
7853 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_TILED_LEFT:
7854 break;
7855 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_TILED_RIGHT:
7856 break;
7857 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_TILED_TOP:
7858 break;
7859 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_TILED_BOTTOM:
7860 break;
7861 default:
7862 break;
7863 }
7864 }
7865
7866 toplevel->state_change->push_back(window_state);
7867 toplevel->state_change->push_back(width);
7868 toplevel->state_change->push_back(height);
7869
7870 toplevel->state_change->push_back(Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Active);
7871 toplevel->state_change->push_back(is_active);
7872}
7873
7874// }}}
7875// {{{ XDG : Listener Handlers : WM Base
7876
7880void Yetani::handlerXdgWmBasePing(void* //data ///< User data
7881 , struct xdg_wm_base* xdg_wm_base
7882 , uint32_t serial
7883 ) noexcept
7884{
7885 xdg_wm_base_pong(xdg_wm_base, serial);
7886}
7887
7888// }}}
7889// {{{ XDG : Listener Handlers (Unstable) : Decoration
7890
7894void Yetani::handlerXdgToplevelDecorationConfigure(void* data
7895 , struct zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1* //decoration ///< The Decoration object
7896 , uint32_t mode
7897 ) noexcept
7898{
7899 Yetani::XdgDecoration* deco = (Yetani::XdgDecoration*)data;
7900
7901 deco->state_change->push_back(Yetani::XdgState::Toplevel_Decoration);
7902 deco->state_change->push_back(mode);
7903}
7904
7905// }}}
7906// {{{ Window
7907
7919/* Disabled because Doxygen does not support "enum classes"
7920 *
7921 * \var Yetani::Client_Side
7922 * \brief The user app must draw the decorations.
7923 *
7924 * \var Yetani::Server_Side
7925 * \brief The Wayland Compositor will draw the decorations.
7926 */
7927
7933/* Disabled because Doxygen does not support "enum classes"
7934 *
7935 * \var Yetani::Normal
7936 * \brief A normal window.
7937 *
7938 * \var Yetani::Fullscreen
7939 * \brief A window that uses the entire screen, no borders.
7940 *
7941 * \var Yetani::Maximized
7942 * \brief A window that uses as much of the screen as possible.
7943 */
7944
7945
8072Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizeMm& size
8073 , std::error_code& error
8074 ) noexcept
8075{
8076 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Millimeter
8077 , size
8078 , { 0, 0 }
8079 , { 0, 0 }
8080 , SHM_FORMAT_DEFAULT
8081 , error
8082 );
8083}
8084
8085
8098Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizeMm& size
8099 , const wl_shm_format format
8100 ) noexcept
8101{
8102 std::error_code error;
8103
8104 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Millimeter
8105 , size
8106 , { 0, 0 }
8107 , { 0, 0 }
8108 , format
8109 , error
8110 );
8111}
8112
8113
8129Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizeMm& size
8130 , const wl_shm_format format
8131 , std::error_code& error
8132 ) noexcept
8133{
8134 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Millimeter
8135 , size
8136 , { 0, 0 }
8137 , { 0, 0 }
8138 , format
8139 , error
8140 );
8141}
8142
