8157Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizePercent& size
8158 , std::error_code& error
8159 ) noexcept
8160{
8161 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Percent
8162 , { 0, 0 }
8163 , size
8164 , { 0, 0 }
8165 , SHM_FORMAT_DEFAULT
8166 , error
8167 );
8168}
8169
8170
8183Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizePercent& size
8184 , const wl_shm_format format
8185 ) noexcept
8186{
8187 std::error_code error;
8188
8189 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Percent
8190 , { 0, 0 }
8191 , size
8192 , { 0, 0 }
8193 , format
8194 , error
8195 );
8196}
8197
8198
8214Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizePercent& size
8215 , const wl_shm_format format
8216 , std::error_code& error
8217 ) noexcept
8218{
8219 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Percent
8220 , { 0, 0 }
8221 , size
8222 , { 0, 0 }
8223 , format
8224 , error
8225 );
8226}
8227
8228
8242Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizePixel& size
8243 , std::error_code& error
8244 ) noexcept
8245{
8246 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel
8247 , { 0, 0 }
8248 , { 0, 0 }
8249 , size
8250 , SHM_FORMAT_DEFAULT
8251 , error
8252 );
8253}
8254
8255
8268Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizePixel& size
8269 , const wl_shm_format format
8270 ) noexcept
8271{
8272 std::error_code error;
8273
8274 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel
8275 , { 0, 0 }
8276 , { 0, 0 }
8277 , size
8278 , format
8279 , error
8280 );
8281}
8282
8283
8299Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizePixel& size
8300 , const wl_shm_format format
8301 , std::error_code& error
8302 ) noexcept
8303{
8304 return windowCreate(Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel
8305 , { 0, 0 }
8306 , { 0, 0 }
8307 , size
8308 , format
8309 , error
8310 );
8311}
8312
8313
8321Yetani::Window* Yetani::windowCreate(const Yetani::SizeUnit size_unit
8322 , const Yetani::SizeMm& size_mm
8323 , const Yetani::SizePercent& size_percent
8324 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size_pixel
8325 , const wl_shm_format pixel_format
8326 , std::error_code& error
8327 ) noexcept
8328{
8329 if((size_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Millimeter)
8330 && (size_mm.width <= 0 || size_mm.height <= 0)
8331 )
8332 {
8333 error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
8334
8335 return nullptr;
8336 }
8337
8338 if((size_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Percent)
8339 && (size_percent.width <= 0 || size_percent.height <= 0)
8340 )
8341 {
8342 error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
8343
8344 return nullptr;
8345 }
8346
8347 if((size_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel)
8348 && (size_pixel.width <= 0 || size_pixel.height <= 0)
8349 )
8350 {
8351 error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
8352
8353 return nullptr;
8354 }
8355
8356 const std::string file_name = "Zakero.Yetani."
8357 + std::to_string(ZAKERO_STEADY_TIME_NOW(nanoseconds))
8358 ;
8359
8360 struct WindowData window_data =
8361 { .yetani = this
8362 , .wl_shm = shm
8363 , .wl_output = nullptr
8364 , .file_name = file_name
8365 , .size_mm = size_mm
8366 , .size_percent = size_percent
8367 , .size_pixel = size_pixel
8368 , .size_unit = size_unit
8369 , .pixel_format = pixel_format
8370 , .error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None)
8371 };
8372
8373 windowDataInit(window_data);
8374
8375 if(window_data.error)
8376 {
8377 error = window_data.error;
8378
8379 return nullptr;
8380 }
8381
8382 Yetani::Window* window = new Window(&window_data);
8383
8384 if(window_data.error)
8385 {
8386 delete window;
8387 window = nullptr;
8388
8389 ZAKERO_YETANI__DEBUG << to_string(window_data.error) << "\n";
8390
8391 error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_Window_Initialization_Failed);
8392
8393 return nullptr;
8394 }
8395
8396 error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
8397
8398 return window;
8399}
8400
8401
8405void Yetani::windowDataInit(Yetani::WindowData& window_data
8406 ) noexcept
8407{
8408 windowDataInitOutput(window_data);
8409
8410 if(window_data.error)
8411 {
8412 return;
8413 }
8414
8415 window_data.size_pixel.width = std::max(1, window_data.size_pixel.width);
8416 window_data.size_pixel.height = std::max(1, window_data.size_pixel.height);
8417
8418 window_data.error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
8419}
8420
8421
8425void Yetani::windowDataInitOutput(Yetani::WindowData& window_data
8426 ) noexcept
8427{
8428 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
8429
8430 if(output_data.output_map.empty())
8431 {
8432 window_data.error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_No_Output_Available);
8433
8434 return;
8435 }
8436
8437 const auto& iter = output_data.output_map.begin();
8438
8439 window_data.wl_output = iter->first;
8440 Yetani::Output& output = iter->second;
8441
8442 if(window_data.size_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Millimeter)
8443 {
8444 auto px = convertMmToPixel(output
8445 , window_data.size_mm.width
8446 , window_data.size_mm.height
8447 );
8448
8449 auto pc = convertPixelToPercent(output
8450 , px.first
8451 , px.second
8452 );
8453
8454 window_data.size_mm = window_data.size_mm;
8455 window_data.size_percent = { pc.first, pc.second };
8456 window_data.size_pixel = { px.first, px.second };
8457 }
8458 else if(window_data.size_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Percent)
8459 {
8460 auto px = convertPercentToPixel(output
8461 , window_data.size_percent.width
8462 , window_data.size_percent.height
8463 );
8464
8465 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
8466 , px.first
8467 , px.second
8468 );
8469
8470 window_data.size_mm = { mm.first, mm.second };
8471 window_data.size_percent = window_data.size_percent;
8472 window_data.size_pixel = { px.first, px.second };
8473 }
8474 else if(window_data.size_unit == Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel)
8475 {
8476 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
8477 , window_data.size_pixel.width
8478 , window_data.size_pixel.height
8479 );
8480
8481 auto pc = convertPixelToPercent(output
8482 , window_data.size_pixel.width
8483 , window_data.size_pixel.height
8484 );
8485
8486 window_data.size_mm = { mm.first, mm.second };
8487 window_data.size_percent = { pc.first, pc.second };
8488 window_data.size_pixel = window_data.size_pixel;
8489 }
8490
8491 window_data.error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
8492}
8493
8494
8498void Yetani::windowInitMemory(Yetani::WindowData& window_data
8499 , Yetani::Window::Memory& window_memory
8500 ) noexcept
8501{
8502 size_t size_in_bytes = sizeInBytes(window_data.size_pixel
8503 , window_data.pixel_format
8504 ) * 3;
8505
8506 window_data.error = window_memory.memory_pool.init(size_in_bytes
8507 , true
8508 , zakero::MemoryPool::Alignment::Bits_32
8509 );
8510
8511 if(window_data.error)
8512 {
8513 return;
8514 }
8515
8516 window_memory.wl_shm_pool = wl_shm_create_pool(window_data.wl_shm
8517 , window_memory.memory_pool.fd()
8518 , window_memory.memory_pool.size()
8519 );
8520
8521 window_memory.memory_pool.sizeOnChange([&](size_t new_size)
8522 {
8523 wl_shm_pool_resize(window_memory.wl_shm_pool, new_size);
8524 });
8525
8526 window_data.error = ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
8527}
8528
8529
8533void Yetani::windowInitOutput(Yetani::WindowData& window_data
8534 , struct wl_surface* wl_surface
8535 ) noexcept
8536{
8537 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
8538
8539 output_data.surface_output_map[wl_surface].push_back(window_data.wl_output);
8540}
8541
8542
8546void Yetani::windowEraseMemory(Yetani::Window::Memory& window_memory
8547 ) noexcept
8548{
8549 if(window_memory.wl_shm_pool)
8550 {
8551 wl_shm_pool_destroy(window_memory.wl_shm_pool);
8552 window_memory.wl_shm_pool = nullptr;
8553 }
8554}
8555
8556
8560void Yetani::windowEraseOutput(struct wl_surface* wl_surface
8561 ) noexcept
8562{
8563 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
8564
8565 if(output_data.surface_output_map.contains(wl_surface))
8566 {
8567 output_data.surface_output_map.erase(wl_surface);
8568 }
8569}
8570
8571
8575void Yetani::windowEraseSurfaceExtent(struct wl_surface* wl_surface
8576 ) noexcept
8577{
8578 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(surface_extent_mutex);
8579
8580 if(surface_extent_map.contains(wl_surface))
8581 {
8582 surface_extent_map.erase(wl_surface);
8583 }
8584}
8585
8586
8590void Yetani::windowAdd(Yetani::Window* window
8591 ) noexcept
8592{
8593 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(window_vector_mutex);
8594
8595 window_vector.push_back(window);
8596}
8597
8598
8602void Yetani::windowRemove(Yetani::Window* window
8603 ) noexcept
8604{
8605 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(window_vector_mutex);
8606
8607 zakero::vectorErase(window_vector, window);
8608}
8609
8610// }}}
8611// {{{ Window : Documentation
8612
8778// }}}
8779// {{{ Window : Constructor / Destructor
8780
8808Yetani::Window::Window(void* ptr
8809 )
8810 : yetani {((Yetani::WindowData*)ptr)->yetani}
8811 , wl_buffer {nullptr}
8812 , wl_surface {nullptr}
8813 , xdg_surface {nullptr}
8814 , xdg_toplevel {nullptr}
8815 , xdg_decoration {nullptr}
8816 , window_memory {nullptr, ((Yetani::WindowData*)ptr)->file_name}
8817 , pixel_format {((Yetani::WindowData*)ptr)->pixel_format}
8818{
8819 Yetani::WindowData& window_data = *((Yetani::WindowData*)ptr);
8820
8821 yetani->windowInitMemory(window_data, window_memory);
8822 if(window_data.error)
8823 {
8824 return;
8825 }
8826
8827 wl_surface = yetani->surfaceCreate(yetani
8828 , pixel_format
8829 , window_data.size_pixel
8830 , window_memory
8831 );
8832
8833 xdg_surface = yetani->xdgSurfaceCreate(wl_surface);
8834
8835 yetani->xdgSurfaceSetExtent(wl_surface
8836 , window_data.size_unit
8837 , window_data.size_mm
8838 , window_data.size_percent
8839 , window_data.size_pixel
8840 );
8841
8842 xdg_toplevel = yetani->xdgToplevelCreate(xdg_surface);
8843
8844 xdg_decoration = yetani->xdgDecorationCreate(xdg_surface, xdg_toplevel);
8845
8846 wl_surface_commit(wl_surface);
8847
8848 yetani->windowInitOutput(window_data, wl_surface);
8849 if(window_data.error)
8850 {
8851 return;
8852 }
8853
8854 yetani->windowAdd(this);
8855}
8856
8857
8861Yetani::Window::~Window()
8862{
8863 yetani->windowRemove(this);
8864
8865 if(xdg_decoration != nullptr)
8866 {
8867 yetani->xdgDecorationDestroy(xdg_surface, xdg_toplevel, xdg_decoration);
8868 }
8869
8870 if(xdg_toplevel != nullptr)
8871 {
8872 yetani->xdgToplevelDestroy(xdg_surface, xdg_toplevel);
8873 }
8874
8875 if(xdg_surface != nullptr)
8876 {
8877 yetani->xdgSurfaceDestroy(wl_surface, xdg_surface);
8878 }
8879
8880 if(wl_surface != nullptr)
8881 {
8882 yetani->windowEraseOutput(wl_surface);
8883 yetani->surfaceDestroy(yetani, wl_surface);
8884 yetani->windowEraseSurfaceExtent(wl_surface);
8885 }
8886
8887 yetani->windowEraseMemory(window_memory);
8888}
8889
8890// }}}
8891// {{{ Window : Cursor
8892
8906std::error_code Yetani::Window::cursorUse(const std::string& name
8907 ) noexcept
8908{
8909 if(name.empty())
8910 {
8911 return yetani->cursorDetach(wl_surface);
8912 }
8913
8914 return yetani->cursorAttach(name, wl_surface);
8915}
8916
8917
8923void Yetani::Window::cursorHide() noexcept
8924{
8925 yetani->cursorHide(wl_surface);
8926}
8927
8928
8934void Yetani::Window::cursorShow() noexcept
8935{
8936 yetani->cursorShow(wl_surface);
8937}
8938
8939// }}}
8940// {{{ Window : Settings
8941
8958void Yetani::Window::classSet(const std::string& class_name
8959 ) noexcept
8960{
8961 xdg_toplevel_set_app_id(xdg_toplevel, class_name.c_str());
8962}
8963
8964
8971void Yetani::Window::titleSet(const std::string& title
8972 ) noexcept
8973{
8974 xdg_toplevel_set_title(xdg_toplevel, title.c_str());
8975}
8976
8977
8997std::error_code Yetani::Window::decorationsSet(const Yetani::WindowDecorations decorations
8998 ) noexcept
8999{
9000 if(yetani->decoration_manager == nullptr)
9001 {
9002 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_Server_Side_Decorations_Not_Available);
9003 }
9004
9005 uint32_t decoration_state = decorations == Yetani::WindowDecorations::Server_Side
9006 ? ZXDG_TOPLEVEL_DECORATION_V1_MODE_SERVER_SIDE
9007 : ZXDG_TOPLEVEL_DECORATION_V1_MODE_CLIENT_SIDE
9008 ;
9009
9010 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_set_mode(xdg_decoration
9011 , decoration_state
9012 );
9013
9014 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
9015}
9016
9017
9025Yetani::WindowMode Yetani::Window::windowMode() noexcept
9026{
9027 XdgToplevel& toplevel = yetani->xdg_toplevel_map[xdg_surface];
9028
9029 Yetani::WindowMode window_mode = Yetani::toWindowMode(toplevel.window_state);
9030
9031 return window_mode;
9032}
9033
9034
9043bool Yetani::Window::windowModeIs(const Yetani::WindowMode window_mode
9044 ) noexcept
9045{
9046 XdgState window_state = Yetani::toXdgState(window_mode);
9047
9048 XdgToplevel& toplevel = yetani->xdg_toplevel_map[xdg_surface];
9049
9050 if(toplevel.window_state == window_state)
9051 {
9052 return true;
9053 }
9054
9055 return false;
9056}
9057
9058
9067void Yetani::Window::windowModeSet(const Yetani::WindowMode window_mode
9068 ) noexcept
9069{
9070 XdgState window_state = Yetani::toXdgState(window_mode);
9071
9072 XdgToplevel& toplevel = yetani->xdg_toplevel_map[xdg_surface];
9073
9074 if(toplevel.window_state == window_state)
9075 {
9076 return;
9077 }
9078
9079 switch(window_mode)
9080 {
9081 case WindowMode::Fullscreen:
9082 xdg_toplevel_set_fullscreen(xdg_toplevel, nullptr);
9083 break;
9084
9085 case WindowMode::Maximized:
9086 xdg_toplevel_set_maximized(xdg_toplevel);
9087 break;
9088
9089 case WindowMode::Normal:
9090 xdg_toplevel_unset_fullscreen(xdg_toplevel);
9091 xdg_toplevel_unset_maximized(xdg_toplevel);
9092 break;
9093 }
9094}
9095
9096
9113std::error_code Yetani::Window::sizeSet(const Yetani::SizeMm& size
9114 ) noexcept
9115{
9116 if(size.width <= 0 || size.height <= 0)
9117 {
9118 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
9119 }
9120
9121 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel = convertToPixel(size);
9122
9123 if(size_pixel.width <= 0)
9124 {
9125 size_pixel.width = 1;
9126 }
9127
9128 if(size_pixel.height <= 0)
9129 {
9130 size_pixel.height = 1;
9131 }
9132
9133 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
9134 {
9135 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = yetani->surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
9136
9137 surface_extent.preferred_unit = Yetani::SizeUnit::Millimeter;
9138 surface_extent.preferred_mm = size;
9139 surface_extent.size_pixel = size_pixel;
9140
9141 surfaceCalculateSize(yetani, wl_surface, size_pixel);
9142 }
9143 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
9144
9145 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
9146}
9147
9148
9165std::error_code Yetani::Window::sizeSet(const Yetani::SizePercent& size
9166 ) noexcept
9167{
9168 if(size.width <= 0 || size.height <= 0)
9169 {
9170 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
9171 }
9172
9173 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel = convertToPixel(size);
9174
9175 if(size_pixel.width <= 0)
9176 {
9177 size_pixel.width = 1;
9178 }
9179
9180 if(size_pixel.height <= 0)
9181 {
9182 size_pixel.height = 1;
9183 }
9184
9185 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
9186 {
9187 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = yetani->surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
9188
9189 surface_extent.preferred_unit = Yetani::SizeUnit::Percent;
9190 surface_extent.preferred_percent = size;
9191 surface_extent.size_pixel = size_pixel;
9192
9193 surfaceCalculateSize(yetani, wl_surface, size_pixel);
9194 }
9195 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
9196
9197 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
9198}
9199
9200
9217std::error_code Yetani::Window::sizeSet(const Yetani::SizePixel& size
9218 ) noexcept
9219{
9220 if(size.width <= 0 || size.height <= 0)
9221 {
9222 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
9223 }
9224
9225 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
9226 {
9227 Yetani::SurfaceExtent& surface_extent = yetani->surface_extent_map[wl_surface];
9228
9229 surface_extent.preferred_unit = Yetani::SizeUnit::Pixel;
9230 surface_extent.size_pixel = size;
9231
9232 surfaceCalculateSize(yetani, wl_surface, size);
9233 }
9234 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
9235
9236 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
9237}
9238
9239
9251std::error_code Yetani::Window::sizeSetMinMax(const Yetani::SizeMm& size_min
9252 , const Yetani::SizeMm& size_max
9253 ) noexcept
9254{
9255 std::error_code error = validateMinMax<Yetani::SizeMm>(size_min, size_max);
9256 if(error)
9257 {
9258 return error;
9259 }
9260
9261 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel_min;
9262 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel_max;
9263
9264 {
9265 Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
9266
9267 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
9268
9269 Yetani::VectorWlOutput& vector = output_data.surface_output_map[wl_surface];
9270 struct wl_output* wl_output = vector.front();
9271 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map[wl_output];
9272
9273 auto min = yetani->convertMmToPixel(output, size_min.width, size_min.height);
9274 size_pixel_min = { min.first, min.second };
9275
9276 auto max = yetani->convertMmToPixel(output, size_max.width, size_max.height);
9277 size_pixel_max = { max.first, max.second };
9278 }
9279
9280 yetani->xdgToplevelSizeMinMaxChange(yetani
9281 , xdg_toplevel
9282 , wl_surface
9283 , size_pixel_min
9284 , size_pixel_max
9285 );
9286
9287 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
9288}
9289
9290
9302std::error_code Yetani::Window::sizeSetMinMax(const Yetani::SizePercent& size_min
9303 , const Yetani::SizePercent& size_max
9304 ) noexcept
9305{
9306 std::error_code error = validateMinMax<Yetani::SizePercent>(size_min, size_max);
9307 if(error)
9308 {
9309 return error;
9310 }
9311
9312 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel_min;
9313 Yetani::SizePixel size_pixel_max;
9314
9315 {
9316 Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
9317
9318 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
9319
9320 Yetani::VectorWlOutput& vector = output_data.surface_output_map[wl_surface];
9321 struct wl_output* wl_output = vector.front();
9322 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map[wl_output];
9323
9324 auto min = yetani->convertPercentToPixel(output, size_min.width, size_min.height);
9325 size_pixel_min = { min.first, min.second };
9326
9327 auto max = yetani->convertPercentToPixel(output, size_max.width, size_max.height);
9328 size_pixel_max = { max.first, max.second };
9329 }
9330
9331 yetani->xdgToplevelSizeMinMaxChange(yetani
9332 , xdg_toplevel
9333 , wl_surface
9334 , size_pixel_min
9335 , size_pixel_max
9336 );
9337
9338 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
9339}
9340
9341
9353std::error_code Yetani::Window::sizeSetMinMax(const Yetani::SizePixel& size_min
9354 , const Yetani::SizePixel& size_max
9355 ) noexcept
9356{
9357 std::error_code error = validateMinMax<Yetani::SizePixel>(size_min, size_max);
9358 if(error)
9359 {
9360 return error;
9361 }
9362
9363 yetani->xdgToplevelSizeMinMaxChange(yetani
9364 , xdg_toplevel
9365 , wl_surface
9366 , size_min
9367 , size_max
9368 );
9369
9370 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
9371}
9372
9373// }}}
9374// {{{ Window : Rendering
9375
9412std::error_code Yetani::Window::imageNext(uint8_t*& image
9413 , Yetani::SizePixel& size
9414 ) noexcept
9415{
9416 if(wl_buffer != nullptr)
9417 {
9418 bufferDestroy(wl_buffer);
9419 }
9420
9421 Yetani::SurfaceSize& surface_size = yetani->surface_size_map[wl_surface];
9422
9423 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].lock();
9424 {
9425 wl_buffer = bufferCreate(surface_size
9426 , &window_memory
9427 , &yetani->buffer
9428 );
9429 }
9430 yetani->surface_resize_mutex_map[wl_surface].unlock();
9431
9432 image = window_memory.memory_pool.addressOf(
9433 yetani->buffer.map[wl_buffer].offset
9434 );
9435
9436 size = { surface_size.width, surface_size.height };
9437
9438 return ZAKERO_YETANI__ERROR(Error_None);
9439}
9440
9441
9448void Yetani::Window::imagePresent() noexcept
9449{
9450 if(wl_buffer == nullptr)
9451 {
9452 // This nullptr check is needed because:
9453 // - If imagePresent() is called before imageNext() then
9454 // wl_buffer could be nullptr.
9455 // - There is a chance that a valid "buffer_next" can be
9456 // replaced with a nullptr, and this will cause a
9457 // frame-drop.
9458
9459 return;
9460 }
9461
9462 Yetani::SurfaceFrame& surface_frame = yetani->surface_frame_map[wl_surface];
9463
9464 wl_buffer = surface_frame.buffer_next.exchange(wl_buffer);
9465}
9466
9467
9480uint32_t Yetani::Window::time() const noexcept
9481{
9482 Yetani::SurfaceFrame& surface_frame = yetani->surface_frame_map[wl_surface];
9483
9484 return surface_frame.time_ms;
9485}
9486
9487// }}}
9488// {{{ Window : Misc
9489
9498uint8_t Yetani::Window::bytesPerPixel() const noexcept
9499{
9500 return yetani->shmFormatBytesPerPixel(pixel_format);
9501}
9502
9503
9511void Yetani::Window::minimize() noexcept
9512{
9513 xdg_toplevel_set_minimized(xdg_toplevel);
9514}
9515
9516// }}}
9517// {{{ Window : Measurement Conversion
9518
9526Yetani::PointMm Yetani::Window::convertToMm(const Yetani::PointPixel& point
9527 ) const noexcept
9528{
9529 const Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
9530
9531 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
9532
9533 struct wl_output* wl_output = output_data.surface_output_map.at(wl_surface).front();
9534 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map.at(wl_output);
9535
9536 auto p = yetani->convertPixelToMm(output, point.x, point.y);
9537
9538 return { point.time, p.first, p.second };
9539}
9540
9541
9549Yetani::PointPercent Yetani::Window::convertToPercent(const Yetani::PointPixel& point
9550 ) const noexcept
9551{
9552 const Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
9553
9554 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
9555
9556 struct wl_output* wl_output = output_data.surface_output_map.at(wl_surface).front();
9557 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map.at(wl_output);
9558
9559 auto p = yetani->convertPixelToPercent(output, point.x, point.y);
9560
9561 return { point.time, p.first, p.second };
9562}
9563
9564
9572Yetani::PointPixel Yetani::Window::convertToPixel(const Yetani::PointMm& point
9573 ) const noexcept
9574{
9575 Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
9576
9577 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
9578
9579 struct wl_output* wl_output = output_data.surface_output_map[wl_surface].front();
9580 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map[wl_output];
9581
9582 auto p = yetani->convertMmToPixel(output, point.x, point.y);
9583
9584 return { point.time, p.first, p.second };
9585}
9586

9595Yetani::PointPixel Yetani::Window::convertToPixel(const Yetani::PointPercent& point
9596 ) const noexcept
9597{
9598 Yetani::OutputData& output_data = yetani->output_data;
9599
9600 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_data.mutex);
9601
9602 struct wl_output* wl_output = output_data.surface_output_map[wl_surface].front();
9603 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map[wl_output];
9604
9605 auto p = yetani->convertPercentToPixel(output, point.x, point.y);
9606
9607 return { point.time, p.first, p.second };
9608}

9622

9629
9630 return { p.first, p.second };
9631}

9652

9654}

9664Yetani::SizePixel Yetani::Window::convertToPixel(const Yetani::SizeMm& size
9665 ) const noexcept

9668

9672 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map[wl_output];
9673
9674 auto p = yetani->convertMmToPixel(output, size.width, size.height);
9675
9676 return { p.first, p.second };
9677}

9687Yetani::SizePixel Yetani::Window::convertToPixel(const Yetani::SizePercent& size
9688 ) const noexcept
9689{

9691

9693

9695 const Yetani::Output& output = output_data.output_map[wl_output];
9696
9697 auto p = yetani->convertPercentToPixel(output, size.width, size.height);
9698
9699 return { p.first, p.second };
9700}

9716void Yetani::Window::onCloseRequest(Yetani::Lambda lambda
9717 ) noexcept
9718{
9719 XdgToplevel& toplevel = yetani->xdg_toplevel_map[xdg_surface];
9720
9721 if(lambda == nullptr)
9722 {
9723 toplevel.close_request_lambda = Lambda_DoNothing;
9724 }
9725 else
9726 {
9727 toplevel.close_request_lambda = lambda;
9728 }
9729}
9730

9742 ) noexcept
9743{

9745
9746 if(lambda == nullptr)
9747 {
9748 decoration.lambda = LambdaWindowDecorations_DoNothing;
9749 }
9750 else
9751 {
9752 decoration.lambda = lambda;
9753 }
9754}

9780 {
9781 toplevel.is_active_lambda = lambda;
9782 }

9791void Yetani::Window::keyboardOnEnter(Yetani::Lambda lambda
9792 ) noexcept
9793{
9794 if(yetani->keyboard.event_map.contains(wl_surface) == false)
9795 {
9796 return;
9797 }
9798
9799 Yetani::KeyboardEvent& event = yetani->keyboard.event_map[wl_surface];
9800
9801 if(lambda == nullptr)
9802 {
9803 event.on_enter = Lambda_DoNothing;
9804 }
9805 else
9806 {
9807 event.on_enter = lambda;
9808 }
9809}

10371// }}}
10372// {{{ Window : Helpers
10373
10374
10375// }}}
10376// {{{ Convenience
10377
10385std::string to_string(const wl_shm_format& shm_format
10386 ) noexcept
10387{
10388 return Yetani::shmFormatName(shm_format);
10389}
10390
10391
10399std::string to_string(const Yetani::Key& key
10400 ) noexcept
10401{
10402 return std::string()
10403 + "{ \"time\": " + std::to_string(key.time)
10404 + ", \"code\": " + std::to_string(key.code)
10405 + ", \"state\": \"" + zakero::to_string(key.state) + "\""
10406 + " }";
10407}
10408
10409
10418std::string to_string(const Yetani::KeyModifier& key_modifier
10419 ) noexcept
10420{
10421 auto mod_to_str = [](std::string& s, uint32_t m)
10422 {
10423 s += "[";
10424 std::string delim = "";
10425
10426 if(m & Yetani::KeyModifier_Shift)
10427 {
10428 s += delim + "\"Shift\"";
10429 delim = ",";
10430 }
10431
10432 if(m & Yetani::KeyModifier_CapsLock)
10433 {
10434 s += delim + "\"CapsLock\"";
10435 delim = ",";
10436 }
10437
10438 if(m & Yetani::KeyModifier_Control)
10439 {
10440 s += delim + "\"Control\"";
10441 delim = ",";
10442 }
10443
10444 if(m & Yetani::KeyModifier_Alt)
10445 {
10446 s += delim + "\"Alt\"";
10447 delim = ",";
10448 }
10449
10450 if(m & Yetani::KeyModifier_NumLock)
10451 {
10452 s += delim + "\"NumLock\"";
10453 }
10454
10455 if(m & Yetani::KeyModifier_Meta)
10456 {
10457 s += delim + "\"Meta\"";
10458 }
10459
10460 s += "]";
10461 };
10462
10463 std::string str = "{ \"pressed\": ";
10464 mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.pressed);
10465
10466 str += ", \"latched\": ";
10467 mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.latched);
10468
10469 str += ", \"locked\": ";
10470 mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.locked);
10471
10472 str += " }";
10473
10474 return str;
10475}
10476
10477
10485std::string to_string(const Yetani::KeyState& key_state
10486 ) noexcept
10487{
10488 switch(key_state)
10489 {
10490 case Yetani::KeyState::Pressed: return "Pressed";
10491 case Yetani::KeyState::Released: return "Released";
10492 case Yetani::KeyState::Repeat: return "Repeat";
10493 default: return "";
10494 }
10495}
10496
10497
10505std::string to_string(const Yetani::Output& output
10506 ) noexcept
10507{
10508 return std::string()
10509 + "{ \"x\": " + std::to_string(output.x)
10510 + ", \"y\": " + std::to_string(output.y)
10511 + ", \"physical_width_mm\": " + std::to_string(output.physical_width_mm)
10512 + ", \"physical_height_mm\": " + std::to_string(output.physical_height_mm)
10513 + ", \"subpixel\": " + std::to_string(output.subpixel)
10514 + ", \"subpixel_name\": \"" + Yetani::outputSubpixelName(output.subpixel) + "\""
10515 + ", \"make\": \"" + output.make + "\""
10516 + ", \"model\": \"" + output.model + "\""
10517 + ", \"name\": \"" + output.name + "\""
10518 + ", \"description\": \"" + output.description + "\""
10519 + ", \"transform\": " + std::to_string(output.transform)
10520 + ", \"transform_name\": \"" + Yetani::outputTransformName(output.transform) + "\""
10521 + ", \"flags\": " + std::to_string(output.flags)
10522 + ", \"width\": " + std::to_string(output.width)
10523 + ", \"height\": " + std::to_string(output.height)
10524 + ", \"refresh_mHz\": " + std::to_string(output.refresh_mHz)
10525 + ", \"scale_factor\": " + std::to_string(output.scale_factor)
10526 + ", \"pixels_per_mm_horizontal\": " + std::to_string(output.pixels_per_mm_horizontal)
10527 + ", \"pixels_per_mm_vertical\": " + std::to_string(output.pixels_per_mm_vertical)
10528 + " }";
10529}
10530
10531
10539std::string to_string(const Yetani::PointMm& point
10540 ) noexcept
10541{
10542 return std::string()
10543 + "{ \"time\": " + std::to_string(point.time)
10544 + ", \"x\": " + std::to_string(point.x)
10545 + ", \"y\": " + std::to_string(point.y)
10546 + " }";
10547}
10548
10549
10557std::string to_string(const Yetani::PointPercent& point
10558 ) noexcept
10559{
10560 return std::string()
10561 + "{ \"time\": " + std::to_string(point.time)
10562 + ", \"x\": " + std::to_string(point.x)
10563 + ", \"y\": " + std::to_string(point.y)
10564 + " }";
10565}
10566
10567
10575std::string to_string(const Yetani::PointPixel& point
10576 ) noexcept
10577{
10578 return std::string()
10579 + "{ \"time\": " + std::to_string(point.time)
10580 + ", \"x\": " + std::to_string(point.x)
10581 + ", \"y\": " + std::to_string(point.y)
10582 + " }";
10583}
10584
10585
10593std::string to_string(const Yetani::PointerAxis& axis
10594 ) noexcept
10595{
10596 return std::string()
10597 + "{ \"time\": " + std::to_string(axis.time)
10598 + ", \"steps\": " + std::to_string(axis.steps)
10599 + ", \"distance\": " + std::to_string(axis.distance)
10600 + ", \"source\": " + zakero::to_string(axis.source)
10601 + ", \"type\": " + zakero::to_string(axis.type)
10602 + " }";
10603}
10604
10605
10613std::string to_string(const Yetani::PointerAxisSource& source
10614 ) noexcept
10615{
10616 switch(source)
10617 {
10618 case Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Continuous: return "Continuous";
10619 case Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Finger: return "Finger";
10620 case Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Wheel: return "Wheel";
10621 case Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Wheel_Tilt: return "Wheel Tilt";
10622 case Yetani::PointerAxisSource::Unknown: [[fallthrough]];
10623 default: return "";
10624 }
10625}
10626
10627
10635std::string to_string(const Yetani::PointerAxisType& type
10636 ) noexcept
10637{
10638 switch(type)
10639 {
10640 case Yetani::PointerAxisType::Horizontal: return "Horizontal";
10641 case Yetani::PointerAxisType::Vertical: return "Vertical";
10642 case Yetani::PointerAxisType::Unknown: [[fallthrough]];
10643 default: return "";
10644 }
10645}
10646
10647
10655std::string to_string(const Yetani::PointerButton& button
10656 ) noexcept
10657{
10658 return std::string()
10659 + "{ \"code\": " + std::to_string(button.code)
10660 + ", \"state\": " + zakero::to_string(button.state)
10661 + " }";
10662}
10663
10664
10672std::string to_string(const Yetani::PointerButtonState& button_state
10673 ) noexcept
10674{
10675 switch(button_state)
10676 {
10677 case Yetani::PointerButtonState::Pressed: return "Pressed";
10678 case Yetani::PointerButtonState::Released: return "Released";
10679 default: return "";
10680 }
10681}
10682
10683
10691std::string to_string(const Yetani::SizeMm& size
10692 ) noexcept
10693{
10694 return std::string()
10695 + "{ \"width\": " + std::to_string(size.width)
10696 + ", \"height\": " + std::to_string(size.height)
10697 + " }";
10698}
10699
10700
10708std::string to_string(const Yetani::SizePercent& size
10709 ) noexcept
10710{
10711 return std::string()
10712 + "{ \"width\": " + std::to_string(size.width)
10713 + ", \"height\": " + std::to_string(size.height)
10714 + " }";
10715}
10716
10717
10725std::string to_string(const Yetani::SizePixel& size
10726 ) noexcept
10727{
10728 return std::string()
10729 + "{ \"width\": " + std::to_string(size.width)
10730 + ", \"height\": " + std::to_string(size.height)
10731 + " }";
10732}
10733
10734
10742std::string to_string(const Yetani::WindowMode& window_mode
10743 ) noexcept
10744{
10745 switch(window_mode)
10746 {
10747 case Yetani::WindowMode::Fullscreen: return "Fullscreen";
10748 case Yetani::WindowMode::Maximized: return "Maximized";
10749 case Yetani::WindowMode::Normal: return "Normal";
10750 default: return "";
10751 }
10752}
10753
10754
10768bool operator==(Yetani::PointMm& lhs
10769 , Yetani::PointMm& rhs
10770 ) noexcept
10771{
10772 return zakero::equalish(lhs.x, rhs.x, 0.001)
10773 && zakero::equalish(lhs.y, rhs.y, 0.001)
10774 ;
10775}
10776
10777
10791bool operator==(Yetani::PointPercent& lhs
10792 , Yetani::PointPercent& rhs
10793 ) noexcept
10794{
10795 return zakero::equalish(lhs.x, rhs.x, 0.00001)
10796 && zakero::equalish(lhs.y, rhs.y, 0.00001)
10797 ;
10798}
10799
10800
10811bool operator==(Yetani::PointPixel& lhs
10812 , Yetani::PointPixel& rhs
10813 ) noexcept
10814{
10815 return (lhs.x == rhs.x) && (lhs.y == rhs.y);
10816}
10817
10818
10830bool operator==(Yetani::SizeMm& lhs
10831 , Yetani::SizeMm& rhs
10832 ) noexcept
10833{
10834 return zakero::equalish(lhs.width, rhs.width, 0.001)
10835 && zakero::equalish(lhs.height, rhs.height, 0.001)
10836 ;
10837}
10838
10839
10851bool operator==(Yetani::SizePercent& lhs
10852 , Yetani::SizePercent& rhs
10853 ) noexcept
10854{
10855 return zakero::equalish(lhs.width, rhs.width, 0.00001)
10856 && zakero::equalish(lhs.height, rhs.height, 0.00001)
10857 ;
10858}
10859
10860
10869bool operator==(Yetani::SizePixel& lhs
10870 , Yetani::SizePixel& rhs
10871 ) noexcept
10872{
10873 return (lhs.width == rhs.width) && (lhs.height == rhs.height);
10874}
10875
10876// }}}
10877
10878}
10879
10880#endif // ZAKERO_YETANI_IMPLEMENTATION
10881
10882// }}}
10883
10884#endif // zakero_Yetani_h
